Same as on the original website

ārya - arthaviniścayo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ samāptaḥ ||

imāni bhikṣava ucyante dvādaśāyatanāni || / (5) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamo dvādaśāṅgaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ? avidyāpratyayāḥ Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22396155 (0.028):

bhavati nāmarupe / tasya nirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ / ṣaḍāyatananirodhāt		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15216765 (0.0):
NidSa 5.27 ity avidyānirodhāt saṃskāranirodhaḥ | saṃskāranirodhād / vijñānanirodhaḥ | vijñānanirodhān nāmarūpanirodhaḥ | nāmarūpanirodhāt		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, II-III (psp_2-3u.htm.txt) 15233127 (0.0):
'nimittato 'praṇihitato 'nabhisaṃskārataḥ saṃskāranirodhād vijñānanirodho / vijñānanirodhād nāmarūpanirodho nāmarūpanirodhāt ṣaḍāyatananirodhaḥ		 Pravrajyavastu of the Vinayavstvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (Vastu 1 im (vinv01_u.htm.txt) 9435358 (0.0):

nāmarūpam | api tu vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam |		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15217367 (0.008):
nāpy asvayaṃkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṃ nāmarūpam | api tu / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam |		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15217415 (0.012):

(1) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katame pañca skandhāḥ? tadyathā - rūpaskandhaḥ | / vedanāskandhaḥ | saṃjñāskandhaḥ | saṃskāraskandhaḥ | vijñānaskandhaḥ | ime		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22390446 (5.960):
skandhā dhātava āyatanāni ca kati / skandhāḥ pañca / rūpaskandho / vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaśca // dhātavo		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22392958 (5.960):
rasadhātuḥ kāyadhātuḥ spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ mano dhātvekadeśaśca // / vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandhaśca dharmadhātvekadeśaḥ /		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22393812 (5.960):

tatra yāvadbhāvikatā katamā | yasmātpareṇa rūpaskandho (Śbh_Sh: 196) vā, / vedanāskandho vā, saṃjñāskandho [vā], saṃskā[ra]skandho vā, vijñānaskandho		 ^ (brsvbh2u.htm.txt) 23590243 (0.041):

idamucyate saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānamiti | vijñānasahabhuvaścatvāro / 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhā nāmarūpam | tadvijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamucyate |		 Vasubandhu: Abhidharmakosa-bhasya (vakobhau.htm.txt) 23985095 (0.044):
caturbhyo 'nye tu saṃskāraskandhaḥ / rūpavedanāsaṃjñāvijñānebhyaścatubbryo 'nye tu saṃskārāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ/		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11935346 (0.045):
nāmarūpavibhaṃga evaṃ nirdeśāt. nāma katamat. catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhā / iti. rūpaṃ katamat. yatkimcid rūpam iti vistareṇa. yāvad yac cedaṃ rūpaṃ		 Nagarjuna: Salistambakamahayanasutratika (nagsaliu.htm.txt) 16520330 (0.048):
iti vijñānena sahodgatā iti tu vijñānasya hetuta udbhūtāḥ | catuḥskandhā / arūpiṇaḥ | iti tu catvāro vijñāna-skandhāḥ		 Candrakirti: Prasannapada (canprasu.htm.txt) 25856196 (0.050):

iti manasikaroti śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ / kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo bahirdhāśūnya iti manasikaroti yāvat		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 755627 (0.0):
śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 768814 (0.0):
mano rūpaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ / śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 780246 (0.0):
sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśaḥ / ghrāṇasaṃsparśaḥ jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ sacet subhūte		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 788338 (0.0):
asyābhinivṛttir bhaviṣyati evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo / jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ atyantatayā āyuṣman śāriputra		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, V (psp_5u.htm.txt) 17262843 (0.0):
cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyo draṣṭavyaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo / ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15085465 (0.0):
eva śūnyatā śūnyataiva cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo / ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśaḥ, tathā hi bhagavan		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15094795 (0.0):
śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo / jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ śūnya ātmanā cātmīyena ca,		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15103111 (0.0):
cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśena śūnyaḥ, evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo / ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15105076 (0.0):
ghrāṇavijñānaṃ jihvāvijñānaṃ kāyavijñānaṃ manovijñānaṃ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ / śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo
kāyasaṃsparśaḥ | manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ |(ayamucyate sparśaḥ) || Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6932946 (5.960):
śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśo kāyasaṃsparśo / manaḥsaṃsparśo duḥkha iti dharmaṃ deśayanti/ manaḥsaṃsparśo 'nātmeti śānta		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6933728 (5.960):
tathā ca manyate upalambhayogena/ evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo / jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo 'dhyātmaśūnya iti		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6933740 (5.960):
manasikaroti/ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ / kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo bahirdhāśūnya iti manasikaroti/ yāvat		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6933755 (5.960):
śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo / manaḥsaṃsparśo 'bhāvasvabhāvaśūnyam iti manasikaroti/		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6947146 (5.960):
spraṣṭavyaṃ dharmaḥ cakṣuḥsaṃsparśaḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo / jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 754821 (5.960):
sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśo / kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo duḥkha iti dharmaṃ deśayanti manaḥsaṃsparśo		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 755603 (5.960):

iti manasikaroti śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ / kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo bahirdhāśūnya iti manasikaroti yāvat		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 755630 (5.960):

evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo / manaḥsaṃsparso manaḥsaṃsparśe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate, itareṣu ca na		 Satasahasrika Prajnaparamita II-3 (sspp2_3u.htm.txt) 23351216 (5.960):
cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo vā śrotrasaṃsparśo vā ghrāṇasaṃsparśo vā jihvāsaṃsparśo vā / kāyasaṃsparśo vā manaḥsaṃsparśo vā. cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā vā		 Satasahasrika Prajnaparamita II-1 (sspp2_1u.htm.txt) 24908439 (0.012):
ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na sa jihvāsaṃsparśo na sa kāyasaṃsparśo na sa		 Satasahasrika Prajnaparamita, II-2 (sspp2_2u.htm.txt) 22963328 (0.012):
kāyasaṃsparśasyānutpādo na sa kāyasaṃsparśaḥ, manaḥsaṃsparśa āyuṣmañ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6970828 (0.013):

na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na jihvāsaṃsparśo na kāyasaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśo		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15103423 (0.013):
na ghrāṇasaṃsparśo na jihvāsaṃsparśo na kāyasaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśaḥ
(e) sparśapratyayā vedanā | vedanā katamā? ṣaḍ vedanāḥ | katame(māḥ?)ṣaṭ? Avadanasataka (avsata_u.htm.txt) 5688334 (0.018):
nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam* | ṣaḍayatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ | / sparśapratyayā vedanā | vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā | tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam* |		 Nagarjuna: Salistambakamahayanasutratika (nagsaliu.htm.txt) 16514604 (0.018):
nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam | ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ | / sparśapratyayā vedanā | vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā| tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam |		 Prajnakaramati: Bodhicaryavatarapanjika (bsa054_u.htm.txt) 19448971 (0.018):

(Psvibh, Vaidya 118) sparśapratyayā vedaneti vedanā katamā? tisro vedanāḥ		 Lalitavistara (bsu022_u.htm.txt) 9887557 (0.035):
kiṃpratyayā punarvedanā? tasyaitadabhūt sparśe sati vedanā bhavati, / sparśapratyayā hi vedanā // / atha bodhisattvasya punaretadabhavat kasmin sati sparśo bhavati,
cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca | śrotrasaṃsparśajā Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954436 (0.007):
duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca | jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954447 (0.007):
ca | kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |		 Prajnakaramati: Bodhicaryavatarapanjika (bsa054_u.htm.txt) 19463976 (0.018):
trividhā hi vedanāsukhā vedanā, duḥkhā vedanā, aduḥkhāsukhā ceti / tatra		 Candrakirti: Prasannapada (canprasu.htm.txt) 25855042 (0.018):
vittirvedanetyucyate | duḥkhā sukhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca trividhā | yathā		 Samyuktagama (966-972 according to the Chinese canon) (samyu_wu.htm.txt) 22233331 (0.023):
13. tisra imā agnivaiśyāyana vedanāḥ. katamās tisraḥ. sukhā vedanā duḥkhā / vedanā, aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ca. itīmās tisro vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15193660 (0.024):
tatra vedanā katamā / tadyathā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca vedanā / tatra		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15193679 (0.027):
gardhāśritā, naiṣkramyāśritā vedanā sukhāpi duḥkhāpy aduḥkhāsukhāpi /		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6305776 (0.030):
naivasātaṃ nāsātaṃ veditaṃ [vigatarāgaṃ] | vedanāgatamidamucyate duḥkhā / aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā | sā punaryā pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktā | sā kāyikī |		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 1980703 (0.031):
(pṛ) vedanā katamā | (u) sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca | (pṛ) sukhā katamā		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6305600 (0.033):
tatra vedanā katamā [|] tadyathā sukhā, duḥkhā, (Śbh_Sh 294) aduḥkhāsukhā / ca vedanā | tatra sukhāpi kāyikī | duḥkhāpyaduḥkhāsukhāpi [|] yathā kāyikī		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 1983106 (0.038):
vedanā sukhādibhinnā | sūtre tūktam sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā / aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti | yadi vedyata iti vedanā | kena tadvedyata iti		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6963539 (0.056):
jihvāsaṃsparśo yaś ca kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 785026 (0.056):

paṭvīti tad eva vikalpakam uktaṃ. ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyā vedanāvad iti. yathā / cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti vistareṇoktaṃ. tathā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñeti		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6958841 (0.062):
sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokam abhibhūya niryāsyati/ evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśajā / vedanā ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā kāyasaṃsparśajā		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 780368 (0.062):

vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca | ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954447 (0.007):
duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca | jihvāsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā / ca | kāyasaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |		 Prajnakaramati: Bodhicaryavatarapanjika (bsa054_u.htm.txt) 19463976 (0.017):
trividhā hi vedanāsukhā vedanā, duḥkhā vedanā, aduḥkhāsukhā ceti / tatra		 Candrakirti: Prasannapada (canprasu.htm.txt) 25855042 (0.018):
vittirvedanetyucyate | duḥkhā sukhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca trividhā | yathā		 Samyuktagama (966-972 according to the Chinese canon) (samyu_wu.htm.txt) 22233331 (0.021):
13. tisra imā agnivaiśyāyana vedanāḥ. katamās tisraḥ. sukhā vedanā duḥkhā / vedanā, aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ca. itīmās tisro vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15193660 (0.024):
tatra vedanā katamā / tadyathā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca vedanā / tatra		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15193679 (0.027):
gardhāśritā, naiṣkramyāśritā vedanā sukhāpi duḥkhāpy aduḥkhāsukhāpi /		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6305776 (0.030):
naivasātaṃ nāsātaṃ veditaṃ [vigatarāgaṃ] | vedanāgatamidamucyate duḥkhā / aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā | sā punaryā pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktā | sā kāyikī |		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 1980703 (0.031):
(pṛ) vedanā katamā | (u) sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca | (pṛ) sukhā katamā		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6305600 (0.033):
tatra vedanā katamā [|] tadyathā sukhā, duḥkhā, (Śbh_Sh 294) aduḥkhāsukhā / ca vedanā | tatra sukhāpi kāyikī | duḥkhāpyaduḥkhāsukhāpi [|] yathā kāyikī		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 1983106 (0.035):
vedanā sukhādibhinnā | sūtre tūktam sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā / aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti | yadi vedyata iti vedanā | kena tadvedyata iti		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15220664 (0.035):
tisro vedanāḥ | sukhā vedanā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca |		 Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962127 (0.035):

cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 785026 (0.058):
kāyasaṃsparśo yaś ca manaḥsaṃsparśo yā ca cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca / śrotrasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca ghrāṇasaṃsparśajā vedanā yā ca

upekṣaivāsukhāduḥkhā vedanā | ato na sā nāstīti |		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22391134 (0.032):
kāyāḥ sukhā vā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā // punaḥ sukhā kāyikī vedanā duḥkhā / kāyikī vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā kāyikīvedanā sukhā caitasikī vedanā duḥkhā
(o) vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā | katamā tṛṣṇā? ṣaṭ tṛṣṇākāyāḥ | katame ṣaṭ? Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962133 (0.018):
| sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca || / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇeti tṛṣṇā katamā? tisrastṛṣṇāḥ | kāmatṛṣṇā rūpatṛṣṇā		 Dharmaskandha (dhrmsk_u.htm.txt) 28238509 (0.019):
/ trayāṇāṃ sannipātāt sparśaḥ / sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā / tṛṣṇā / tad ucyate vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā /		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2953948 (0.023):
sparśapratyayā vedanā | vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā | tṛṣṇāpratyayādupādānam |		 Candrakirti: Prasannapada (canprasu.htm.txt) 25855596 (0.023):
ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, / tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ, bhavapratyayā jātiḥ,		 Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan (dsp1-2_u.htm.txt) 25250776 (0.023):
ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, / tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavo, bhavapratyayā jātir,		 Haribhatta: Jatakamala, Jatakas 1-8, 11-12, 19-20, 22, 24, 26, 32, 35. (hjatm_pu.htm.txt) 6684944 (0.023):
ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam upādānapratyayo bhavo		 Kasyapaparivartasutra (kasyparu.htm.txt) 9785541 (0.023):
2 ṣaḍāyatanapratyaya sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam		 Mahavadanasutra (mavadsuu.htm.txt) 19111384 (0.023):
ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18702220 (0.023):
nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaṃ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā / vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānaṃ upādānapratyayo bhavo		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18799998 (0.023):
sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānaṃ		 Nagarjuna: Salistambakamahayanasutratika (nagsaliu.htm.txt) 16518486 (0.023):

nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā / vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam upādānapratyayo bhava		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15216405 (0.023):

katamaḥ? tadyathā - narakāḥ | tiryañcapretāḥ | asurāḥ | ṣaṭ kāmāvacarā
devāḥ || tadyathā - aṣṭau mahānarakāḥ | katame 'ṣṭauḥ? tadyathā - uṣṇā

atha ghorarūpaṃ narakaṃ prapatiṣye avākśiro // / saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ ca saṃghātaṃ dvau ca rauravau /		 Vasubandhu: Abhidharmakosa-bhasya (vakobhau.htm.txt) 24018710 (0.061):

|| katame ṣaṭ devāḥ? cāturmahārājikā devāḥ | trāyastriṃśāḥ | yāmāḥ | Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9828498 (0.007):
manuṣyo vā cāturmahārājikā vā devās trayastriṃśā vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā / nirmāṇaratayo vā paranirmitavaśavartino vā brahmapārṣadyo vā		 Larger Prajnaparamita (pplg1__u.htm.txt) 27755066 (0.011):

vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam upādānapratyayo bhavo / bhavapratyayā jātir jātipratyayā
tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātiḥ, saṃjātiḥ, avakrāntiḥ, abhinirvṛttiḥ, Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962182 (0.0):
bhavapratyayā jātiriti jātiḥ katamā? yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ / tasmiṃstasmin sattvanikāye jātiḥ saṃjātiravakrāntirabhirvṛttiḥ		 Dharmaskandha (dhrmsk_u.htm.txt) 28241742 (0.009):
jarā katamā / (DhskD 16r8) āha / yat teṣāṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ / satvanikāye jātiḥ saṃjātir avakrāntir abhinirvṛttir vistareṇa		 Dharmaskandha (dhrmsk_u.htm.txt) 28240716 (0.012):
taddhetu (DhskD 14r4) tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedān narakeṣūpapadyate / / tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir avakrāntir abhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ		 Dharmaskandha (dhrmsk_u.htm.txt) 28241586 (0.012):
naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ (DhskD 16r2) devānāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ upapadyate / / tatra yā jātiḥ saṃjātir avakrāntir abhinirvṛttiḥ prādurbhāvaḥ		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 1987344 (0.026):

NidSa 16.14 bhavapratyayā jātir iti jātiḥ katamā | / yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ tasmin tasmin satvanikāye jātiḥ sañjātir
skandhānāṃ prādurbhāvaḥ, āyatanānāṃ pratilambhaḥ, jīvitendriyasyodbhavaḥ Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962195 (0.029):

|(iyamucyate jātiḥ |) || / (gha) (jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam | jarā katamā?) nikāyasabhāgatāyāstasyā Dharmaskandha (dhrmsk_u.htm.txt) 28241732 (1.788):

jarāmaraṇaṃ bhavati, jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam //		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15217226 (0.026):
jarāmaraṇam | api tu jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam |		 Candrakirti: Prasannapada (canprasu.htm.txt) 25820382 (0.026):
ahetukamajātasya syājjarāmaraṇaṃ katham || 4 || / jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanājjātihetukaṃ jarāmaraṇamuktaṃ bhagavatā		 Nagarjuna: Salistambakamahayanasutratika (nagsaliu.htm.txt) 16514620 (0.026):

yat khālityaṃ pālityaṃ valīpracuratā jīrṇatā bhugnatā kub Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962211 (0.0):

jagopānasīvakratā khurukhuruśvāsapraśvāsaśca tilakālakopahatagātratā
purataḥ prāgbhārakāyatā daṇḍāvaṣṭambhatā indriyāṇāṃ paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15220781 (0.041):
daṇḍaviṣṭaṃbhanatā tilakāḍaracitagātratā dhandhatvaṃ hāniḥ parihāṇir / indriyāṇāṃ paripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāvaḥ |		 Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962241 (0.041):

parihāṇiḥ | iyamucyate jarā || tatra maraṇaṃ katamat? yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ Dharmaskandha (dhrmsk_u.htm.txt) 28241849 (0.020):
purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāva iyam ucyate jarā / / maraṇaṃ katamad / āha / yat teṣāṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ tasmāt tasmāt
tasmācchavikāyāccyutiḥ cyavanatā bhedo 'ntardhānaṃ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā āyuṣo
hāniḥ uṣmaṇo hāniḥ jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ | Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962265 (0.026):
cyutiḥ cyavanato bhedaḥ antarahāṇiḥ āyuṣo hāṇiḥ uṣmaṇo hāṇiḥ / jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā |		 Dharmaskandha (dhrmsk_u.htm.txt) 28241868 (0.035):

satvanikāyāc cyutiś cyavanaṃ bhedo 'ntarhāṇir āyuṣo hānir uṣmaṇo hānir
idamucyate maraṇam || yadetanmaraṇaṃ pūrvikā ca jarā, Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15220815 (0.017):
jīvitasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaṇaṃ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā | idam ucyate / maraṇam | / itīdañ ca maraṇam | pūrvikā ca jarā | tad ubhayaṃ jarāmaraṇam ity ucyate |		 Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962273 (0.026):
jīvitendriyasya nirodhaḥ skandhānāṃ nikṣepaḥ maraṇaṃ kālakriyā |
tadubhayamekatrābhisaṃkṣipya jarāmaraṇamityucyate || ayaṃ bhikṣavo Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962277 (0.043):

duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyam | duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyam | duḥkhanirodhagāminī A Digital edition of the Abhisamacarika-Dharma (abhisdhu.htm.txt) 14512764 (0.0):
prasannacittasya catvāry āryasatyāni pradarśitāni duḥkham āryasatyaṃ / duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ duḥkhani(34a7)rodham āryasatyaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954789 (0.0):
pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham | idamucyate duḥkhamāryasatyam || tatra / duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ katamat? tadyathā - yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954835 (0.0):
vyayībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgamaḥ, idamucyate / duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyam || tatra duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadā āryasatyaṃ		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18679093 (0.0):
punaḥ loke saha dharmeṇa yam idaṃ catvāry āryasatyāni / sayyathīdaṃ dūkhaṃ / āryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18793869 (0.0):
uttānīkaroti prakāśayati / duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ / duḥkhanirodhaṃ		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782824 (0.007):
sayyathīdaṃ duḥkham āryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayo āryasatyaṃ duḥkhanirodho		 Civaravastu of the Vinayavastvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (= Vastu 7 of (vinv07_u.htm.txt) 22217967 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodha idaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīpratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ		 Ekottaragama (fragments). (ekottaru.htm.txt) 7090085 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ		 Ekottaragama (fragments). (ekottaru.htm.txt) 7090112 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / iyam		 Lalitavistara (bsu022_u.htm.txt) 9899070 (0.015):
samyagdṛṣṭiryāvatsamyaksamādhiriti / idamucyate duḥkhanirodhagāminī / pratipadāryasatyamiti / imāni bhikṣavaścatvāryāryasatyāni / iti duḥkhamiti		 Madhyamakavatara [Chapter 6 not available at present!] (bsa053_u.htm.txt) 28758919 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadāryasatyamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti / sa		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782947 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadāryasatyaṃ //		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13644516 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13647478 (0.015):
duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ; iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipat / āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13647644 (0.015):
udapādi; tat khalu duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam abhijñayā		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13648086 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyaṃ katamat? āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ;		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18019694 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhaḥ; iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18019784 (0.015):
ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad / āryasatyaṃ yathābhūtam prajānāti; tasyaivaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyataḥ		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11975513 (0.015):
duḥkham āryasatyam ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11984599 (0.015):
ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī / pratipad āryasatyam iti yathabhūtaṃ prajānāti. trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni
pratipadā āryasatyam || tatra duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ katamat? tadyathā - Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954835 (0.0):
duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyam || tatra duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadā āryasatyaṃ		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13648008 (5.960):
duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam; 1) duḥkham		 Civaravastu of the Vinayavastvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (= Vastu 7 of (vinv07_u.htm.txt) 22217967 (0.015):

duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadāryasatyaṃ //		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13644516 (0.015):

duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ; iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipat / āryasatyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasi		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13647644 (0.015):

duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti. tan na darśanamārgam		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11984599 (0.015):
ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī / pratipad āryasatyam iti yathabhūtaṃ prajānāti. trīṇi cāsya saṃyojanāni		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11990942 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhaḥ. (Abhidh k vy 515) iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad / āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti. pūrvāvedhād iti. pūrvākṣepāt.		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12006406 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti.		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12007860 (0.015):
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti. pūrvam ananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu
jātirduḥkham | jarā duḥkham | vyādhirduḥkham | maraṇaṃ duḥkham | Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22398778 (0.0):
saṃgṛhītānyaṣṭau aṣṭasu vā saṃgṛhītāstisraḥ / pāraṃparṣalakṣaṇa saṃgrahāt / / jātirdukhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2050952 (0.0):
catussatyavibhaṅga uktam jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi		 Lalitavistara (bsu022_u.htm.txt) 9899003 (0.0):
duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipat / tatra katamad duḥkham? / jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15222912 (0.0):
NidSa 23.13b kiṃ duḥkhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | jātir duḥkham | jarā / duḥkham | vyādhir duḥkham | maraṇaṃ duḥkham | priyaviprayogo duḥkham |		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15189797 (0.0):
tadyathā duḥkhasatyaṃ samudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyaṃ ca / / tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ katamat / tadyathā jātir duḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhir		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13648017 (0.010):
duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam; 1) duḥkham / āryasatyaṃ katamat? jātir duḥkhaṃ, jarā duḥkhaṃ, vyādhir duḥkhaṃ, maraṇaṃ		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6301882 (0.011):
tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ katamat | tadyathā jātirduḥkhaṃ jarāpi [duḥkhaṃ]		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22398641 (0.017):
api khalu duḥkhalakṣaṇaprabhedā aṣṭau / jātirduḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ / vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviprayogo"		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782843 (0.017):
[_Mvu_3.332_] pratipadāryasatyaṃ // tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamaṃ duḥkhaṃ / āryasatyaṃ // tadyathā // jātiḥ duḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhi duḥkhaṃ		 Bodhisattvabhumi (bsa034_u.htm.txt) 24859443 (0.024):
tadetadabhisamasya ṣaḍvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati / saptavidhaṃ duḥkham / / jātirduḥkhaṃ jarāvyādhirmaraṇamapriyasaṃyogaḥ priyavinābhāvaḥ		 Bhagavadgita (bhgsbh_u.htm.txt) 22934044 (0.034):
tasya janmādiṣu pūrvavad anudarśanam | duḥkhaṃ janma, duḥkhaṃ mṛtyuḥ, / duḥkhaṃ jarā, duḥkhaṃ vyādhayaḥ | duḥkha nimittatvāj janmādayo duḥkham, na		 Karandavyuha (bsu019_u.htm.txt) 7112282 (0.038):
bodhisattvaste śūnyatānimittaṃ cintayanti / aho duḥkham, jarā duḥkham, / maraṇaṃ duḥkham, iṣṭapriyasaṃprayogaviyogo duḥkham, avīcyupapannānāṃ		 Karandavyuha (bsu019_u.htm.txt) 7108795 (0.042):
sāṃsārikaṃ satyamanuvicintayanti - aho duḥkham / jātirduḥkham / aho / duḥkham / jarāmaraṇaduḥkham / aho duḥkham / tadapi dāridryaduḥkham /
priyaviprayogo duḥkham | apriyasaṃyogo duḥkham | rūpaṃ duḥkham | vedanā Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782861 (0.0):
pīcchanto paryeṣanto na labhati taṃ pi duḥkhaṃ rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā / duḥkhaṃ saṃjñā duḥkhā saṃskārā duḥkhā vijñānaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15222915 (0.0):
duḥkham | vyādhir duḥkham | maraṇaṃ duḥkham | priyaviprayogo duḥkham |		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13648020 (0.0):
āryasatyaṃ katamat? jātir duḥkhaṃ, jarā duḥkhaṃ, vyādhir duḥkhaṃ, maraṇaṃ / duḥkham, priyaviprayogo duḥkham, apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkham, yad apīcchan		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22398645 (0.017):
api khalu duḥkhalakṣaṇaprabhedā aṣṭau / jātirduḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ / vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviprayogo"		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782847 (0.022):
āryasatyaṃ // tadyathā // jātiḥ duḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhi duḥkhaṃ / maraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ apriyasaṃprayogaṃ duḥkhaṃ priyaviprayogaṃ duḥkhaṃ yaṃ		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22398778 (0.026):
/ jātirdukhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhirduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkham apriyasaṃprayogo		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2050955 (0.029):
catussatyavibhaṅga uktam jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi / duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi duḥkhaṃ vipriyasaṃyogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviyogo duḥkhaṃ		 Lalitavistara (bsu022_u.htm.txt) 9899006 (0.034):
jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi / apriyasaṃprayogo 'pi priyaviprayogo 'pi duḥkham / yadapi icchan		 Samghatasutra (bsu045_u.htm.txt) 7834196 (0.036):
śṛṇvanti / śokaduḥkhaṃ paridevaduḥkhaṃ / priyaviprayogaduḥkhamapriyasaṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ maraṇaṃ tu sarvaduḥkhaṃ		 Samghatasutra (alternative version). (samghscu.htm.txt) 17099468 (0.050):
śokaduḥkhaṃ, paridevaduḥkhaṃ, priyaviprayogaduḥkham, / apriyasaṃprayogaduḥkhaṃ. 3. maraṇaṃ tu sarvaduḥkhaṃ harati. 4. kāyajīvitam		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22398786 (0.052):
duḥkhamiti santānaduḥkhaduḥkhatā / priyaviprayogo duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, V (psp_5u.htm.txt) 17271237 (0.064):
prapañcaḥ, rūpaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham iti vā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ		 Suvikrantavikramipariprccha (bsu030_u.htm.txt) 12554804 (0.064):
na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā / saṃskārāḥ / na vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā / yā ca
duḥkham | saṃjñā duḥkham | saṃskārā duḥkham | vijñānaṃ duḥkham | Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782864 (0.0):
pīcchanto paryeṣanto na labhati taṃ pi duḥkhaṃ rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā / duḥkhaṃ saṃjñā duḥkhā saṃskārā duḥkhā vijñānaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena		 Suvikrantavikramipariprccha (bsu030_u.htm.txt) 12554808 (0.037):
na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā / saṃskārāḥ / na vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā / yā ca		 Astasahasrika Prajnaparamita (bsu049_u.htm.txt) 3999503 (0.040):
sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti na sthātavyam / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ / sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti na sthātavyam / rūpaṃ śūnyamaśūnyamiti na sthātavyam /		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 1981592 (0.044):
yathoktaṃ sūtre rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānañca duḥkhaṃ		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15089255 (0.047):
nāśāntam iti carati, na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ sukham / iti na duḥkham iti nātmeti nānātmeti, na śāntam iti nāśāntam iti carati,		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, V (psp_5u.htm.txt) 17271240 (0.053):
prapañcaḥ, rūpaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham iti vā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6924475 (0.055):
13111 evaṃ na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti {sthātavyaṃ}/ na vedanā na saṃjñā na / saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ / 13112 duḥkham iti sthātavyaṃ/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tathā hi rūpaduḥkhatā		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 746518 (0.055):
iti sthātavyaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15086336 (0.055):
evaṃ na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyaṃ, na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na / vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi rūpaduḥkhatā		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15086384 (0.055):
saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ duḥkham iti sthātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
yadapītthaṃ paryeṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkham | saṃkṣepeṇa Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2050963 (0.0):
yadiṣṭaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa pañcopādānaskandhā
pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham | idamucyate duḥkhamāryasatyam || tatra Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2050966 (0.008):
yadiṣṭaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa pañcopādānaskandhā		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11975506 (0.017):
upāyapravartanān nāsti tasya sūtrasya virodhaḥ. yad idam uktam idaṃ / duḥkham āryasatyam ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15222928 (0.027):
duḥkham | saṃkṣiptena pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham | idaṃ duḥkham | evaṃ		 madhyantavibhagatika.html 19090745 (0.027):
sūtre'py uktaṃ samāsataḥ pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham iti /		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13648030 (0.028):
paryeṣamāṇo na labhate tad api duḥkham; saṅkṣepataḥ pañca ime / upādānaskandhā duḥkham; tasya parijñāyai āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ;		 A Digital edition of the Abhisamacarika-Dharma (abhisdhu.htm.txt) 14512755 (0.029):
prasannacittasya catvāry āryasatyāni pradarśitāni duḥkham āryasatyaṃ / duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ duḥkhani(34a7)rodham āryasatyaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954733 (0.029):
(6) tatra katamāni catvāryāryasatyāni? tadyathā - duḥkhamāryasatyam | / duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyam | duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyam | duḥkhanirodhagāminī		 Candrakirti: Prasannapada (canprasu.htm.txt) 25820771 (0.030):
atrāha vidyata eva ātmā, tatsaṃbandhiduḥkhasadbhāvāt | iha hi / pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamityucyate, tacca asti, tena ca duḥkhena		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2025795 (0.030):
'calacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2051001 (0.031):
(pṛ) yadyapi jātimaraṇādi paśyato nāsravakṣayaḥ syāt | tathāpi / pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamityuktam | teṣāṃ parijñātuḥ kleśā bhidyante |		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782818 (0.033):
sayyathīdaṃ duḥkham āryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayo āryasatyaṃ duḥkhanirodho		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18679086 (0.034):
āryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22398654 (0.036):
duḥkhaṃ yadapīcchanna labhate tadapi duḥkhaṃ saṃkṣiptena / pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham // jātiḥ kimupādāya duḥkham /"		 Vasubandhu: Abhidharmakosa-bhasya (vakobhau.htm.txt) 24051576 (0.037):
yadāpi duḥkhamapyatrāsti tasmāt duḥkhamevāryasatyamucyate /		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782876 (0.039):
paṃcopādānaskaṃdhā duḥkhā / idaṃ bhikṣavaḥ duḥkham āryasatyaṃ // tatra / katamo duḥkhasamudayo āryasatyaṃ / yāyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikā		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18793865 (0.042):
uttānīkaroti prakāśayati / duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ / duḥkhanirodhaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954830 (0.045):
vyayībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgamaḥ, idamucyate / duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyam || tatra duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadā āryasatyaṃ		 Candrakirti: Prasannapada (canprasu.htm.txt) 25847021 (0.045):
tasmādāryāṇāmeva tadduḥkhasatyamiti duḥkhamāryasatyamiti vyavasthāpyate ||		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15189808 (0.046):
maraṇam apriyasaṃprayogaḥ priyavinābhāva icchāvighātaś ca / saṃkṣepataḥ / pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham /		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13647994 (0.048):
bhikṣava āryasatyāni; katamāni catvāri? duḥkham āryasatyaṃ, duḥkhasamudayo / duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam; 1) duḥkham
duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ katamat? tadyathā - yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī A Digital edition of the Abhisamacarika-Dharma (abhisdhu.htm.txt) 14512758 (0.0):
prasannacittasya catvāry āryasatyāni pradarśitāni duḥkham āryasatyaṃ / duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ duḥkhani(34a7)rodham āryasatyaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954735 (0.0):

punaḥ loke saha dharmeṇa yam idaṃ catvāry āryasatyāni / sayyathīdaṃ dūkhaṃ / āryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782821 (0.007):

bhagavatā / tatra katamat samudayāryasatyam? yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13648045 (0.023):
upādānaskandhā duḥkham; tasya parijñāyai āryāṣṭaṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ; / 2) duḥkhasamudayam āryasatyaṃ katamat? tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12039573 (0.023):

duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam; 1) duḥkham / āryasatyaṃ katamat? jātir duḥkhaṃ, jarā duḥkhaṃ, vyādhir duḥkhaṃ, maraṇaṃ
yadasyā eva tṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavikyā / nandīrāgasahagatāyāstatratatrābhinandinyā aśeṣataḥ prahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo Lalitavistara (bsu022_u.htm.txt) 9899043 (0.025):

2.9 yāvac ca bhik(ṣavas tṛṣṇāyāḥ paunarbhavi)kyā (nandirāga)sahagatāyās
vyayībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgamaḥ, idamucyate Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22403900 (0.0):
spraṣṭāvyayatanānāṃ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi /		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15222683 (0.0):
aśeṣaṃ prāhāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantibhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo		 Bhiksukarmavakya (bsa068_u.htm.txt) 26406825 (0.012):
kāmā vigarhitāḥ kāmātmayāḥ kāmaniyantikāḥ sādhyavaśakāmānāṃ prahāṇaṃ / varṇitaṃ pratinisargāntībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodhaḥ vyupaśamo āsamantataḥ		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22404036 (0.016):
paryāyataḥ katamat / aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargaḥ vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo / virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'staṃgama ityevamādi // kimupādāyocyate		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12039594 (0.016):
aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo		 Vasubandhu: Abhidharmakosa-bhasya (vakobhau.htm.txt) 24003744 (0.017):
yat svalpasya duḥkhasyāśeṣaprahāṇaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo / virāgo nirodho vyupakṣamo 'staṅgamaḥ anyasya ca duḥkhasyāprati"		 Bhiksuni-Karmavacana (= BhīKaVā) (bhikavau.htm.txt) 22304047 (0.027):
kāmānāṃ prahāṇam ākhyātaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ / kṣayo virāgo		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13648074 (0.033):
paunarbhavikyāḥ nandīrāgasahagatāyās tatra tatrābhinandinyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ / pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho (SBV I 138) vyupaśamaḥ		 Upasampadajnapti (= Uj) (upsmpjnu.htm.txt) 4520011 (0.037):
kāmādhyavasānaṃ kāmānāṃ prahāṇaṃ varṇitaṃ pratiniḥsargo vyantībhāvaḥ kṣayo / virāgo nirodho vyupaśamo 'stagamaḥ stutaḥ stomito varṇitaḥ praśastaḥ		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18782909 (0.041):
nandīrāgasahagatāye tatratatrābhinandinīye aśeṣakṣayo virāgo nirodho tyāgo / prahāṇo pratiniḥsargo ayaṃ bhikṣavo duḥkhanirodho āryasatyaḥ // tatra		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12015618 (0.057):
iti. bhedavivakṣāyām evam ucyate. abhedavivakṣāyāṃ tu yo virāgaḥ. tat / prahāṇam apy ucyate. nirodho 'pītyādi.
duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyam || tatra duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipadā āryasatyaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2954742 (0.0):

duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ		 Ekottaragama (fragments). (ekottaru.htm.txt) 7090113 (0.015):

samyagdṛṣṭiryāvatsamyaksamādhiriti / idamucyate duḥkhanirodhagāminī / pratipadāryasatyamiti / imāni bhikṣavaścatvāryāryasatyāni / iti duḥkhamiti		 Madhyamakavatara [Chapter 6 not available at present!] (bsa053_u.htm.txt) 28758919 (0.015):

katamat? yaduta samyagdṛśyā(ṣṭyādi?)bhirāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ | tadyathā - Satasahasrika Prajnaparamita II-1 (sspp2_1u.htm.txt) 24935034 (0.059):
āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasya vyayo na sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ, / yo bhagavann āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni, iti hi āryasatyāni ca		 Satasahasrika Prajnaparamita, II-2 (sspp2_2u.htm.txt) 22965927 (0.059):
bodhyaṅgānāṃ vyayo na tāni bodhyaṅgāni, ya āryāṣṭāṅgasya mārgasya vyayo na / sa āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ, ya āryasatyānāṃ vyayo na tāny āryasatyāni, yo		 Satasahasrika Prajnaparamita, II-2 (sspp2_2u.htm.txt) 22966801 (0.059):
bodhyaṅgāni yac cādvaidhīkāraṃ, yaś ca vyayo yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgo yac		 Satasahasrika Prajnaparamita II-3 (sspp2_3u.htm.txt) 23334402 (0.063):
kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi kauśika yaś cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgo yaś ca bodhisattvo yā
kaścitpuruṣo jvarābhibhūtaḥ kuśalasaṃpaddṛṣṭakarmāṇaṃ śrutaśāstraṃ
vaidyamupasaṃkramya kathayedevam - jvare 'śāntibhūto 'smi |
asyopaśamāyauṣadhamupadiśyamānamicchāmīti | sa tasya bhiṣak prāṅ nidānaṃ
pṛcchet - kiṃ tvayā bhuktaṃ pītaṃ ceti | āturastasya kathayet - mayā hi
dadhi trapuṣaṃ bhakṣitam, annapānaṃ takraṃ pītamiti | sa tasya bhiṣag
viśeṣaṇamupadiśya auṣadhamupadiśet | evameva jātyādimahājvarasaṃtāpitāḥ
sādhavo mahācittabhiṣajaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ nāthaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkramya
duḥkhajvarāpahaṃ dharmaṃ pṛccheyuḥ | tebhyo bhagavān nidānaṃ
samudayākhyāmākhyāya āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo mahauṣadhaṃ śāntikaraṃ
nirvāṇamupadiśet | (AvSū, Vaidya 315) kleśāturo 'pyenaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayan
nacirātsarvaduḥkhakṣayamavāpya nirvāṇapuraṃ gatvā pariśāntimavāpnotīti ||
etāni khalu bhikṣavaścatvāryāryasatyāni || / (7) tatra bhikṣavaḥ katama āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ? tadyathā - samyagdṛṣṭiḥ | Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957552 (0.0):

prativiratiḥ saṃrakṣyā, adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt
mupabhogo bhartṛrājāmātāpitṛrakṣitānām | athavā asthānagamyādeśakāleṣu
vipratipattiḥ kāyika(kī) | evaṃ trividhaḥ || anṛtaṃ katamat? sākṣipraśne
'yathābhūtān vitathavacanamanahitā vā arhannasmīti parihāsyavastu,
idamucyate anṛtam || paiśunyaṃ katamat? abhūtena satyena vā
bhedakaraṇavacanaṃ paiśunyam || pārūṣyaṃ katamat?
paraduḥkhacikīrṣoryadaniṣṭavacanaśrāvaṇaduḥkhamasya bhavatu, ityanayā
buddhyā yad niṣṭhūravacanaśrāvaṇaṃ kriyate, tatpāruṣyam ||
saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ katamaḥ? rājakathā caurakathā dyūtakathā madyakathā
strīkathā ākhyāyikākathā | ayamucyate saṃbhinnapralāpaḥ | vācikameva
caturvidham || abhidhyā katamā? paradravyasvīkaraṇecchayā anyasya dravyāṇi
tāniḥ mama syuritīyamucyate abhidhyā || vyāpādaḥ katamaḥ? parasya
jīvitavyaparopaṇamavacchedanapīḍanādicintanam | ayamucyate vyāpādaḥ || Khandadeva: Bhattadipika, a commentary on Jaimini's Mimamsasutra, Adhyaya 1, Adhikarana 1, (jsbh1-1u.htm.txt) 17235145 (0.033):
naca - parasyotasādanārthamiti vākaye karaṇalyuḍantotsādanaśabdena

karaṇīyā lapanā naimittikatā naiṣpeṣikatā lābhena lābhaniścikīrṣatā		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11966460 (0.063):
mithyājīvā bhaveyuḥ kuhanā. lapanā. naimittikatā. naiṣpeṣitā. lābhena / lābhaniścikīrṣā ca. te
bhikṣurdānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā pathi śūnyāgāre niṣīdati dhyāyī
- bhikṣurarhanniti lābhasatkāro me bhaviṣyati, evamādikā kuhanetyucyate ||
tatra lapanā katamā? iha bhikṣurlābhasatkāranimittameva tvaṃ me mātā, tvaṃ
me duhiteti, evamanyānyapi priyavacanāni (AvSū, Vaidya 316) bravīti |
evamādikā lapanetyucyate || tatra naimittikatvaṃ katamat? bhikṣustāvat Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955337 (0.033):
naiva doṣaḥ | idamucyate naimittikatvam || tatra naiṣpeṣikatvaṃ katamat? / bhikṣustāvad yatra gṛhe piṇḍapātraṃ na labhate, dāpayitukāmaśca bhavati,
piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuktvā sakṛdasakṛd yad brūte - yādṛśo 'yaṃ piṇḍapātaḥ, Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955337 (0.046):
naiva doṣaḥ | idamucyate naimittikatvam || tatra naiṣpeṣikatvaṃ katamat? / bhikṣustāvad yatra gṛhe piṇḍapātraṃ na labhate, dāpayitukāmaśca bhavati,
tādṛśo 'nyeṣu upāsakagṛheṣu na labhyate | alābhasatkāracittasya tu vadato
naiva doṣaḥ | idamucyate naimittikatvam || tatra naiṣpeṣikatvaṃ katamat? Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955303 (0.055):

evamādikā lapanetyucyate || tatra naimittikatvaṃ katamat? bhikṣustāvat / piṇḍapātraṃ paribhuktvā sakṛdasakṛd yad brūte - yādṛśo 'yaṃ piṇḍapātaḥ,
tatra brūte - adānapatayo nirayaṃ gacchanti | yūyamapi adānapatayaḥ
vyaktaṃ nirayagāminaḥ, iti narakabhayabhītebhyaḥ piṇḍapātramanu
prayacchati, taṃ ca labdhvā paribhuṅkte | idamucyate naiṣpaṣikatvam || Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955392 (0.034):
paribhuṅkte | iyamucyate bhikṣorlābhena lābhapratikāṅkṣā | ayaṃ bhikṣavo

madyavikrayaḥ | māṃsavikrayaḥ | apravekṣitatilasarṣapapīḍanam |

samyaksaṃkalpaḥ, samyagvāk, samyakkarmāntaḥ, samyagājīvaḥ, samyagvyāyāmaḥ, / samyaksmṛtiḥ, samyaksamādhiḥ. eṣa ucyata āryāṣṭāngamārgaḥ.		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9804004 (0.044):
samyagvāk samyakkarmāntaḥ samyagājīvaḥ samyagvyāyāmaḥ samyaksmṛtiḥ / samyaksamādhiḥ, ayam ucyate āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ.		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6309099 (0.046):
aviparyāyasaṃgṛhītā smṛtiḥ navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā [|] / iyamucyate samyaksmṛtiḥ | samyaksamādhiśca |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955598 (0.046):
caturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | imāni khalu bhikṣavaścatvāri / dhyānāni | ayamucyate samyaksamādhiḥ || ayamucyate bhikṣavaḥ āryāṣṭāṅgo		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955666 (0.047):
(AvSū, Vaidya 317) (9) tatra bhikṣavaścātvāri dhyānāni katamāni? iha / bhikṣavo bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmaiḥ viviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ		 Nidanasamyukta (= NidSa) (nidansyu.htm.txt) 15216973 (0.052):

dvāviṃśatīndriyāṇi || / (AvSū, Vaidya 317) (9) tatra bhikṣavaścātvāri dhyānāni katamāni? iha Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955513 (0.047):

katamā nava? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ viviktam eva kāmair / viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 55 - 70 (first part) (adsp55-u.htm.txt) 23107900 (0.0):

bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃ, ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran, viviktam eva kāmair / viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalaiḥ dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15027598 (0.0):
paripūrayati. sa viviktam eva kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ.		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15033292 (0.0):
(4) katamāni ca navānupūrvasamāpattayaḥ? ihaikatyo (i) viviktam eva kāmair / viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmair savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ.		 Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan (dsp1-2_u.htm.txt) 25251172 (0.0):
[DsP_16] tatra katamāni catvāri dhyānāni? yaduta viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ / pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ		 Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan (dsp1-2_u.htm.txt) 25251873 (0.0):
[DsP_38] tatra katamaḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ? viviktaṃ kāmair / viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam		 Dharmaskandha (dhrmsk_u.htm.txt) 28240843 (0.0):
tatprārthayamānas taddhetos tatsaṃvartanīyaṃ viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ / pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ (DhskD 14r10)		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21598483 (0.0):

bodhisattvaścittaikāgratāmāsādayati sma / āsādya ca viviktaṃ / kāmairviviktaṃ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ		 Mahasudarsanavadana (= MSuAv) (msudarsu.htm.txt) 18124264 (0.0):
praviśya rupyamaye paryaṃke paryaṃkena niṣadya viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ / pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ (GBM 1559.6)		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18636498 (0.0):

arthaḥ. evaṃ sukhāpi dvividheti. asti pratipat sukhā dhandhābhijñā. asti		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6296701 (0.023):
tīkṣṇendrisya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā / kṣiprābhijñā | evaṃ pratipatprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ ||		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15184130 (0.023):

bhavaty āyatarāgaḥ, tīvradveṣa āyatadveṣaḥ, tīvramoha āyatamohaḥ / pūrvaṃ

dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikam avadyaṃ prasavati | tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ / duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ity etad ādīnavaṃ darśayati |		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15190202 (0.064):
kāmacchandaparyavasthitaḥ kāmacchandaparyavasthānapratyayaṃ tajjaṃ / caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate" / evaṃ"
indriyāṇi dhandhāni bhavanti mṛdūni saśīghravāhīni | katamāni pañca? Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955990 (0.0):
pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni | / katamāni pañca? yaduta śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956077 (0.0):

na tīvrarāgo bhavati na tīvradoṣo		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15179126 (0.061):

tīvradveṣo bhavati, tīvramoho bhavati | so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tīvrarāgajaṃ / duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | so 'bhīkṣaṇaṃ tīvradveṣatayā		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15179127 (0.036):

saṃbhinnapralāpenānādeyavākyaḥ | abhidhyayā tīvrarāgaḥ | vyāpādena / tīvradveṣaḥ | mithyādṛṣṭyā tīvramohaḥ | itīdameṣāṃ niṣyandaphalam |		 Subhasitaratnakarandakatha (subhrk_u.htm.txt) 8604351 (0.062):
sa tīvrarāgo bhavatīha naiva bhogair udāraiḥ satataṃ ca yuktaḥ /
duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | abhīkṣṇaṃ tīvradveṣatayā dveṣajaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955889 (0.0):
duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | so 'bhīkṣaṇaṃ tīvradveṣatayā / dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | so 'bhīkṣaṇaṃ tīvramohatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956051 (0.0):
'(lpa)rāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956138 (0.0):
alpadveṣo 'lpamohaḥ | so 'lparāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ / duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | alpadveṣatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ dveṣajaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956062 (0.008):
alpadveṣatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ dveṣajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955876 (0.023):
tīvradveṣo bhavati, tīvramoho bhavati | so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tīvrarāgajaṃ / duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | so 'bhīkṣaṇaṃ tīvradveṣatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956147 (0.028):
duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | alpadveṣatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ dveṣajaḥ / duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | alpamohatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ mohajaṃ
duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | abhīkṣṇaṃ (AvSū, Vaidya 318) Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956054 (0.0):

sāṃparāyikaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikamavadyaṃ prasavati tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ / duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayata ityevaṃ tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ		 Asanga: Mahayanasutralamkara, with Vasubandhu's commentary (asmahsbu.htm.txt) 11318174 (0.064):

kāmacchandaparyavasthitaḥ kāmacchandaparyavasthānapratyayaṃ tajjaṃ / caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate" / evaṃ"
pañca lokottarāṇi indriyāṇi adhimātrāṇi bhavanti tīkṣṇāni śīghravāhīni | Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955893 (0.0):

pratipatkṣiprābhijñā || tatra katamā sukhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā? Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956114 (0.019):
yadutāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya | iyaṃ sukhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā || tatra katamā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955856 (0.036):

catasraḥ pratipadaḥ katamāḥ / duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā duḥkhā		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6296701 (0.057):
tīkṣṇendrisya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā / kṣiprābhijñā | evaṃ pratipatprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ ||		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15184130 (0.057):
/ tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipad iyam / ucyate sukhā kṣiprābhijñā / evaṃ pratipatprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15184078 (0.061):

arthaḥ. evaṃ sukhāpi dvividheti. asti pratipat sukhā dhandhābhijñā. asti
ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaiva alparāgo bhavati, alpadveṣo bhavati | so Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanss19u.htm.txt) 1585211 (0.022):
lokôttarāṃ ca prajñām anuvidhyati | / alparāgo bhavati | / alpadveṣo 'lpamohaḥ |		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_au.htm.txt) 3788063 (0.022):
prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati | loka uttarāṃ ca prajñām anuvidhyati | alpa rāgo / bhavati | alpa dveṣo * alpa mohaḥ | māraś ca + asya + avatāraṃ na labhate		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_pu.htm.txt) 26981824 (0.022):

dhandhātvānmḥdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spḥśati Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955925 (0.016):

samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya | iyaṃ duḥkhā / pratipatkṣiprābhijñā || tatra katamā sukhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā?		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955855 (0.042):
dhandhābhijñā | asti duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā | asti sukhā pratipad / dhandhābhijñā | asti sukhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā | tatra katamā sā duḥkhā		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22406505 (0.043):

sukhā pratipatkṣiprābhijñā? ihaikatyaḥ prakṛtyaivālparāgo bhavati, Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955943 (1.192):

dhandhābhijñā | asti duḥkhā pratipat kṣiprābhijñā | asti sukhā pratipad		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956032 (0.027):
samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya | iyaṃ duḥkhā / pratipatkṣiprābhijñā || tatra katamā sukhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā?		 Asanga: Abhidharmasamuccaya (asabhs_u.htm.txt) 22406507 (0.028):
catasraḥ pratipadaḥ katamāḥ / duḥkhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā duḥkhā / pratipat kṣiprābhijñā sukhā pratipad dhandhābhijñā sukhā pratipat		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6296702 (0.029):
tīkṣṇendrisya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipadiyamucyate sukhā / kṣiprābhijñā | evaṃ pratipatprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ ||		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15184131 (0.029):
/ tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipad iyam / ucyate sukhā kṣiprābhijñā / evaṃ pratipatprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15184085 (0.038):
dhandhābhijñā/ asti pratipad duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā / asti pratipat sukhā		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6296646 (0.040):
duḥkhā dhandhābhijñā | [asti pratipad duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā] | asti		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6296678 (0.050):
dhandhābhijñā | tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā / pratipadiyamucyate duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā | tatra mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15184107 (0.050):
yā pratipad iyam ucyate duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā / tatra mṛdvindriyasya		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12013290 (0.055):
arthaḥ. evaṃ sukhāpi dvividheti. asti pratipat sukhā dhandhābhijñā. asti / sukhā kṣiprābhijñeti. aṃgaparigrahaṇaśamathavipaśyanāsamatābhyām
alpadveṣo 'lpamohaḥ | so 'lparāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956043 (5.960):
'(lpa)rāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956053 (0.012):
'(lpa)rāgatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ rāgajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956062 (0.021):
alpamohatayā nābhīkṣṇaṃ mohajaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955961 (0.025):
tīvradveṣo bhavati, tīvramoho bhavati | so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tīvrarāgatayā rāgajaṃ		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanss19u.htm.txt) 1585211 (0.025):
alparāgo bhavati | / alpadveṣo 'lpamohaḥ |		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_au.htm.txt) 3788063 (0.025):
prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati | loka uttarāṃ ca prajñām anuvidhyati | alpa rāgo / bhavati | alpa dveṣo * alpa mohaḥ | māraś ca + asya + avatāraṃ na labhate		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_pu.htm.txt) 26981824 (0.025):
| lokottarāṃ ca prajñām anuvidhyati | alparāgo bhavati | alpadveṣo / 'lpamohaḥ | māraś cāsyāvatāraṃ na labhate | buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955874 (0.031):
tīvradveṣo bhavati, tīvramoho bhavati | so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ tīvrarāgajaṃ / duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayati | so 'bhīkṣaṇaṃ tīvradveṣatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955968 (0.032):

śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam iti		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11882344 (0.040):
śraddhendriyaṃ yāvat prajñendriyaṃ eṣāṃ paṃcānām indriyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatvāt
tīkṣṇatvācchīghravāhitvācca kṣipramevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955930 (0.0):
mṛdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryasamādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta / āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya | iyaṃ duḥkhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā | tatra katamā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956017 (0.0):
lokottarāṇāmindriyāṇāmadhimātratvācchīghravāhitvācca kṣipramevānantaryaṃ
āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya | iyamucyate sukhā pratipatkṣiprābhijñā | imā bhikṣavaḥ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956106 (0.009):
dhandhātvānmḥdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryaṃ samādhiṃ spḥśati / yadutāsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya | iyaṃ sukhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā || tatra katamā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955933 (0.033):
mṛdutvādaśīghravāhitvācca dhandhamevānantaryasamādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta / āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya | iyaṃ duḥkhā pratipaddhandhābhijñā | tatra katamā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956024 (0.033):
samādhiṃ spṛśati yaduta āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya | iyaṃ duḥkhā
catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ || / [12] tatra katamāścatastraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ? ...........asti bhikṣavaḥ Vimalamitra(?): Abhidharmadipa (= Abhidh-d), with auto(?)-commentary (vabhdicu.htm.txt) 19402257 (0.028):
catasraḥ khalu samādhibhāvanāḥ | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2953737 (0.035):
catvāro brahmavihārāḥ | catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ | catasraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ		 Vasubandhu: Abhidharmakosa-bhasya (vakobhau.htm.txt) 24072765 (0.042):
punaścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanā ucyante / / asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 773384 (0.052):
subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catasraḥ / pratisaṃvidaḥ katamāś catasraḥ dharmapratisaṃvid arthapratisaṃvid		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15109783 (0.052):
catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ. katamāś catasraḥ? dharmapratisaṃvid		 Samadhirajasutra (bsu034_u.htm.txt) 28033011 (0.059):
tasmāttarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ākāṅkṣet kimityahaṃ catasraḥ / pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti | katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvidaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958655 (0.064):
dharmapratisaṃvit niruktipratisaṃvit pratibhānapratisaṃvit | imā / bhikṣavaścatasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ || / [25] katame bhikṣavo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ? nāsti tathāgatasya
samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratilābhāya Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956992 (0.011):
divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati | iyaṃ / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratibhānalābhāya		 Vimalamitra(?): Abhidharmadipa (= Abhidh-d), with auto(?)-commentary (vabhdicu.htm.txt) 19402261 (0.012):
catasraḥ khalu samādhibhāvanāḥ | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā"		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12034826 (0.012):

(AvSū, Vaidya 321) caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | iyaṃ / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956759 (0.023):
bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate | tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956858 (0.023):
yaduta adhyātmakaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena | iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā / bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)vihārāya saṃvartate || tatra		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956873 (0.025):

| tasyaivaṃ bhavatyuktaṃ hi bhagavatā | aśubhā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā / kāmarāgaprahāṇāya samvarttata ityayaṃ tāvanme āptāgamaḥ | pratyātmamapi me		 Vimalamitra(?): Abhidharmadipa (= Abhidh-d), with auto(?)-commentary (vabhdicu.htm.txt) 19402261 (0.019):

sūtra uktam maitrī āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā vyāpādaprahāṇāya"
rimameva kāyamūrdhvaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakādiparyantaṃ yathāsthitaṃ Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6950235 (0.0):
mahāsattva imam eva kāyamūrdhvaṃ / 20604 pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt nakharomatvakparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 771818 (0.0):
bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam eva kāyamūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15108192 (0.0):
amī sarṣapā iti, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam eva kāyam / ūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān nakharomatvakcarmāntaṃ pūrṇaṃ		 Posadhavastu of the Vinayavstvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (Vastu 2 im (vinv02_u.htm.txt) 19296028 (0.0):
Poṣ-v 5.2. bhagavān āha | niṣadyā ucyate yogaḥ | eta yūyaṃ bhikṣava imam / eva kāyam ūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt tvakparyantaṃ yathāsthitaṃ		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanss12u.htm.txt) 19115287 (0.019):
evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyam / ūrddhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakanakharomatvak romaparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_au.htm.txt) 3766042 (0.019):
evam eva bodhi satvo mahā satvaḥ prajñā pāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyam / ūrddhvaṃ pāda talād adhaḥ keśa mastaka nakha roma tvak roma paryantaṃ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6950137 (0.026):
20515 kāyamūrdhvapādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān nakharomatvakparyantaṃ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 771720 (0.026):
prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyamūrdhvapādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15108091 (0.026):
eva kāyam ūrdhvapādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān nakharomatvakparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6305084 (0.029):
bhāvayati | vipaśyanāyāṃ prayuktaḥ | paścātpura imameva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ / yathāpraṇihitaṃ ūrdhvaṃ pādatalādadhaḥ keśamastakātpūrṇaṃ		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15193108 (0.029):
tatrordhvamadhaḥsaṃjñī imam eva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ yathāpraṇihitam ūrdhvaṃ / pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt pūrṇaṃ nānāvidhasyāśuceḥ pratyavekṣate /
tathāpraṇihitaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśuceryathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6950244 (0.033):
20604 pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt nakharomatvakparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ / nānāprakārasyāśucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate santy asmin kāye keśaromāṇi		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 771729 (0.033):
nakharomatvakparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśucer yathābhūtaṃ		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15108100 (0.033):
eva kāyam ūrdhvapādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān nakharomatvakparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ / nānāprakārasyāśucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate, santy asmin kāye keśā		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15108201 (0.033):
ūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān nakharomatvakcarmāntaṃ pūrṇaṃ / nānāprakārasyāśucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate, santy asmin kāye keśā		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_pu.htm.txt) 26961133 (0.033):
ūrddhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakanakharomatvak romaparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ / nānāprakārasyāśucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate | santy asmin kāye keśā		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6950146 (0.044):
20515 kāyamūrdhvapādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān nakharomatvakparyantaṃ / pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyā / 20516 śucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate santy asmin kāye keśaromāṇi nakhā		 Posadhavastu of the Vinayavstvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (Vastu 2 im (vinv02_u.htm.txt) 19296034 (0.049):
eva kāyam ūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakāt tvakparyantaṃ yathāsthitaṃ / yathāpraṇihitaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśuceḥ pratyavekṣadhvaṃ | santy asmin
pratyavekṣate - yaduta ayaṃ kāyaḥ anupūrveṇa samudāgato 'pūrvavināśī
paramāṇusaṃcayaḥ suṣira unnāmonnāmanānmānavavraṇasumukharomakūpasrāvī Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_pu.htm.txt) 26964066 (0.033):

| śakaṭamiva bhārodvahatīrthaḥ | kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā boddha(voḍha?)vyam Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956674 (0.036):
bhārodvahanāya dharmabuddhinā boddha(voḍha)vyam ||
|| punaraparaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā idaṃ śarīramādyuttarakāraṇataḥ
parīkṣitavyam | mātāpitṛśukrarudhirasamutthānamiha śarīrasya ā[dya]kāraṇam
| uttaramāhāraparimāṇādikam | kavalikāhāro grastamātraḥ śleṣmāśayaṃ
gacchati | śleṣmāśayaṃ prāpya śleṣmaṇā dravīkṛto 'tyantāśucirbhavati |
śleṣmataḥ pittāśayaṃ gacchati | pittāśayaṃ prāpya pacyamāna uṣṇībhūtvā
vāyvāśayaṃ gacchati | paktvā vāyvāśayaṃ prāpto vāyunā vibhajyate pṛthak
malaḥ, [pṛ]thak sāraḥ | khalānmūtrapurīṣādayo malāḥ | sārācchoṇitaṃ
pari[ṇa]mati, śoṇitānmāṃsam, māṃsānmedaḥ, medaso 'sthīni, asthibhyo majjā, Chandogya-Upanisad (Chandogyopanisad) (chupsb_u.htm.txt) 3352117 (0.011):
rasocchoṇitaṃ śoṇitānmāṃsaṃ māṃsānmedo medaso 'sthīnyasthibhyo majjā		 Garbha-Upanisad (Garbhopanisad) (garbhupu.htm.txt) 26620240 (0.022):
saumyaguṇatvāt ṣaḍvidho rasaḥ rasāc choṇitaṃ śoṇitān māṃsaṃ māṃsān medo		 Garbha-Upanisad (Garbhopanisad) (garbhupu.htm.txt) 26620247 (0.030):
saumyaguṇatvāt ṣaḍvidho rasaḥ rasāc choṇitaṃ śoṇitān māṃsaṃ māṃsān medo / medasaḥ snāyavaḥ snāyubhyo 'sthīni asthibhyo majjā majjātaḥ śukraṃ		 Vagbhata: Astangahrdayasutra (vagaah_u.htm.txt) 5946266 (0.057):
3.62dv māṃsān medo 'sthi medasaḥ / asthno majjā tataḥ śukraṃ śukrād garbhaḥ prajāyate |
majjātaḥ śukram | tadevamādyuttarakāraṇādaśuci śarīramiti paśyatā bhikṣuṇā Garbha-Upanisad (Garbhopanisad) (garbhupu.htm.txt) 26620247 (0.035):

idaṃ śarīraṃ navabhirasthiśataiḥ saṣaṣṭhaiḥ samucchritaṃ kudārugṛhavat

pittasya, vāyunā kṛtsnamevāpakarṣitam | śoṇitasyāḍhakena, purīṣaprasthaiḥ

bahumānabhāvaḥ? kevalaṃ yācitakabhāṇḍamiva kṣaṇaprayojanārthaṃ śakaṭamiva Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956456 (0.008):
saviṣabhājanamiva parivarjanīyaḥ | yācitakabhāṇḍamiva kṣaṇaprayojanārthaḥ		 Ghatakarparakavya, with Abhinavagupta's Ghatakarparavivrti (aghatkvu.htm.txt) 5710656 (0.064):
sakalavanamadhye śreṣṭho bahvībhiḥ kantābhis tu parivṛta iti śṛṅgāriṇi / bhavati bahumāna ity arthaḥ, tathāpi sayauvanānāṃ yuvatīnāṃ tu netrotsavaḥ
bhārodvahanāya dharmabuddhinā boddha(voḍha)vyam || Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956464 (0.036):
| śakaṭamiva bhārodvahatīrthaḥ | kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā boddha(voḍha?)vyam
evaṃvidhakāyamavekṣya rāśimaśuceḥ, rūpābhimānī vasatyatteyaḥ(?) |
prajñāyamānaṃ sa hi bālabuddhi viṣṭapaṭhaṃ(?) yāti vahaṃ na cetā ||
priyaprakāraṃ vahatenāyat drakṣanvivaktuṃ vahate sadā ca |
kāyaḥ sucokṣaḥ kṛmivacca jantoḥ kuto 'tra rāgo bahumānatā vā || (AvSū,
Vaidya 320) / ityevamādi pratyavekṣanniti | tadyathā bhikṣava ubhayato dvāravinirmuktaḥ
koṣṭhāgāraḥ pūrṇo nānāprakārajātasya dhānyatilasarṣapamudgayavamāṣāṇām |
taccakṣuṣmān puruṣo vyavalokayan jānīyāt - imāni śūkadhānyāni, imāni / phaladhānyāni | evameva bhikṣavo bhikṣurimameva kāyaṃ yathāsthitaṃ Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13630431 (0.059):
māñjiṣṭhe; taṃ cakṣuṣmān puruṣo dṛṣṭvā jānīyād idaṃ sūtram ayaṃ maṇiḥ;
yathāpraṇihitaṃ yāvat pratyavekṣate | iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956226 (0.042):
prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate | tatra katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā / bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣu		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956990 (0.053):
divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati | iyaṃ / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratibhānalābhāya		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956207 (0.057):
[12] tatra katamāścatastraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ? ...........asti bhikṣavaḥ / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratilābhāya		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956217 (0.059):
saṃvartate | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā		 Vimalamitra(?): Abhidharmadipa (= Abhidh-d), with auto(?)-commentary (vabhdicu.htm.txt) 19402259 (0.059):
catasraḥ khalu samādhibhāvanāḥ | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā / bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmavihārāya saṃvartate" iti vistaraḥ | kuśalaṃ khalu"		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12034824 (0.059):
(VIII.27, 28) vistara iti. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12034835 (0.059):
dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya vartate. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā / bahulīkṛtā divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartate. asti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957039 (0.059):
(AvSū, Vaidya 321) caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | iyaṃ / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956856 (0.064):
yaduta adhyātmakaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena | iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā / bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)vihārāya saṃvartate || tatra
bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate | tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956232 (0.019):
prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate | tatra katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6313672 (0.019):
bhavatīyamaśubhatā | evamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6313688 (0.019):
| tasyaivaṃ bhavatyuktaṃ hi bhagavatā | aśubhā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā / kāmarāgaprahāṇāya samvarttata ityayaṃ tāvanme āptāgamaḥ | pratyātmamapi me		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956866 (0.025):
bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)vihārāya saṃvartate || tatra / bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanena		 Vimalamitra(?): Abhidharmadipa (= Abhidh-d), with auto(?)-commentary (vabhdicu.htm.txt) 19402459 (0.049):
sūtra uktam maitrī āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā vyāpādaprahāṇāya / saṃvartate | karuṇā vihiṃsāprahāṇāya | aratiprahāṇāya muditā"
samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956860 (0.0):

saṃvartate || tatra katamā(samā)dhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā / prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2027315 (0.044):

prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati, paripūrayati, pariprīṇayati, parisphuṭayati, Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956839 (0.011):
śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vivekajena / prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati paripūrayati parisphurayati		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017975 (0.042):
samādhijena 		Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017794 (0.060):
viharati; sa imam eva kāyaṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati> / pariṣyandayati pariprīṇāti parispharati; nāsya kiṃcit sarvataḥ kāyād		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017897 (0.060):

tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyādasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ yaduta adhyātmajaṃ Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017854 (0.0):

asphuṭaṃ 		Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6321638 (0.032):
tatra prāvivekye manaskāre vartamāno, ratisaṃgrāhake ca vivekajena / prītisukhena kāyaṃ pratiprīṇayati | kadācit kenacit		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13646499 (0.050):
'lparajaskajātīyā, ye 'śravaṇāt saddharmasya parihīyante; tadyathā / bhadanta utpalāni vā, padmāni vā kumudāni vā, puṇḍarīkāṇi vā udake jātāny,		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956851 (0.051):

parispharati; nāsya kiṃcit sarvataḥ kāyād asphuṭaṃ bhavaty aspharaṇīyaṃ> / yaduta niṣprītikena prītisukhena		 Mahaparinirvanasutra (mpsu_w_u.htm.txt) 24469235 (0.056):
47.20 samana(n)t(arapragṛhītāyāṃ śivikāyāṃ devatā antar)ī(kṣād) d(i)vyāny / utpalāni padmāni (kumudāni puṇḍarīkāny a)garucūrṇāni tagaracūrṇ(ā)ni
kumudāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake magnāni, sarvāṇi tāni Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13646502 (0.002):
bhadanta utpalāni vā, padmāni vā kumudāni vā, puṇḍarīkāṇi vā udake jātāny,		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18018053 (0.041):
yaduta niṣprītikena prītisukhena / 74. tadyathā utpalāni vā padmāni vā kumudāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā 		Mahaparinirvanasutra (mpsu_w_u.htm.txt) 24469235 (0.055):
47.20 samana(n)t(arapragṛhītāyāṃ śivikāyāṃ devatā antar)ī(kṣād) d(i)vyāny / utpalāni padmāni (kumudāni puṇḍarīkāny a)garucūrṇāni tagaracūrṇ(ā)ni		 Mahavadanasutra (mavadsuu.htm.txt) 19108103 (0.059):
dharmatā khalu sāṃpratajātasya Vipaśyino bodhisatvasya devatā antarīkṣād / divyāny utpalāni padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkāṇi agarucūrṇāni tagarucūrṇāni		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13638523 (0.061):
bodhisatvasyopariṣṭād divyāny utpalāni, padmāni, kumudāni, puṇḍarīkāni		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21551992 (0.061):
098.001. gaganatalasthā devatā bhagavata upariṣṭāddivyānyutpalāni kṣipanti / padmāni kumudāni puṇḍarīkānyagarucūrṇāni candanacūrṇāni tagaracūrṇāni		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21570516 (0.061):

śītalena vāriṇābhiṣyanditāni pariṣyanditāni paripūritāni pariprīṇitāni
parisphuritāni | evameva bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956773 (0.0):
saṃvartate? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957015 (0.0):
prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6278834 (0.0):
nivaraṇaviśuddhiḥ katamā [|] so [a]raṇyagato vā, vṛkṣamūlagato vā, / śūnyāgāragato vā, paṃcabhyo nivaraṇebhyaścittaṃ viśodhayati | kāmacchandād		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6310752 (0.0):
paraloke kāṃkṣā vimataya utpadyante | veditavyaṃ mārakarmaitaditi | / araṇyagato vā, vṛkṣamūlagato vā, śūnyāgāragato vā, mahāntambhayabhairavaṃ		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6318106 (0.0):

(pṛ) bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre bhikṣūnāmantryāha [iha bhikṣuḥ] / araṇyagato vāyatanagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā manasi kuryāt		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017494 (0.0):

prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati pariṣyandayati paripūrayati parisphurayati Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956786 (0.011):
śūnyāgāragato vā imameva kāyamadhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ vivekāt na / prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati, paripūrayati, pariprīṇayati, parisphuṭayati,		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017846 (0.015):
evam eva sa imam eva kāyaṃ vivekajena prītasukhenābhiṣyandayati		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017794 (0.028):
viharati; sa imam eva kāyaṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhenābhiṣyandayati> / pariṣyandayati pariprīṇāti parispharati; nāsya kiṃcit sarvataḥ kāyād		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017897 (0.028):
Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18017975 (0.030):
samādhijena 		Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6321637 (0.062):
tatra prāvivekye manaskāre vartamāno, ratisaṃgrāhake ca vivekajena / prītisukhena kāyaṃ pratiprīṇayati | kadācit kenacit
pariprīṇayati, tasya nāsti sarvataḥ kāyamasphuṭaṃ bhavatyaspharaṇīyaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956793 (5.960):

(VIII.27, 28) vistara iti. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12034836 (0.043):
dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya vartate. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā / bahulīkṛtā divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartate. asti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957040 (0.046):
(AvSū, Vaidya 321) caturthaṃ dhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati | iyaṃ / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate		 Vasubandhu: Abhidharmakosa-bhasya (vakobhau.htm.txt) 24072767 (0.058):
punaścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanā ucyante / / asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya		 Vasubandhu: Abhidharmakosa-bhasya (vakobhau.htm.txt) 24072775 (0.061):
asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā vahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya / saṃvartate iti vistaraḥ / / samādhibhāvanā dhyānaṃ śubhamādyaṃ sukhāya hi // VAkK_8.27 //"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957004 (0.064):
saṃvartate || tatra katamā(samā)dhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā / prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣuraraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā
pratilābhāya saṃvartate? iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956949 (0.0):
paryavadātaprabhāsvaraḥ, na tasmā(?)ndhakārasamaye tadbhavati | evameva / bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā ālokasaṃjñā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sugṛhīto bhavati aśṛṃṣṭā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956211 (0.034):

ca parigṛhītā bhavati sumanasi kṛtā sudṛṣṭā supratibaddhā ca

samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956226 (0.0):
saṃvartate | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā / prajñāpratilambhāya saṃvartate | tatra katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957006 (0.0):

catasraḥ khalu samādhibhāvanāḥ | asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā"		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12034825 (0.017):
(VIII.27, 28) vistara iti. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12034836 (0.017):
dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya vartate. asti samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā / bahulīkṛtā divyacakṣurabhijñājñānadarśanāya saṃvartate. asti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956990 (0.029):
divasasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena samaprabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati | iyaṃ / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanapratibhānalābhāya		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956758 (0.031):
bahulīkṛtā kāmarāgaprahāṇāya saṃvartate | tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamā / samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956857 (0.032):
yaduta adhyātmakaṃ vivekajena prītisukhena | iyaṃ samādhibhāvanā āsevitā / bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā dṛṣṭadharma(sukha)vihārāya saṃvartate || tatra		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2956869 (0.046):
bhikṣavaḥ katamā samādhibhāvanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā jñānadarśanena
|| imāścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ || / [13] tatra katamāni bhikṣavaścatvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? iha bhikṣavo Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957141 (0.018):

[DsP_6] tatra katamāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? yaduta kāye		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15032927 (0.039):

bhikṣuradhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān / vinīya loke abhidhyādaurmanasye | bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati,		 Dasabhumikasutram (bsu014_u.htm.txt) 860772 (0.013):
pratiṣṭhito 'dhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān / vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye bahirdhā kāye ... adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā kāye		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 11995286 (0.013):
adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati. ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya / loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye. bahirdhā ye kāyanupaśyī viharati ātāpīti		 Madhyamakavatara [Chapter 6 not available at present!] (bsa053_u.htm.txt) 28758405 (0.014):
saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye) adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15107728 (0.014):
(PvsP1 2: 76) cānupalambhayogena, ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke / 'bhidhyādaurmanasye, evam adhyātmaṃ vedanāsu citte, adhyātmadharmeṣu		 Mahaparinirvanasutra (mpsu_w_u.htm.txt) 24453947 (0.019):

adhyātmabahirdhādharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957062 (0.0):
bhikṣuradhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957097 (0.0):

[14] tatra katamāni bhikṣavaścatvāri samyakprahāṇāni? iha bhikṣavo Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957050 (0.018):
|| imāścatasraḥ samādhibhāvanāḥ || / [13] tatra katamāni bhikṣavaścatvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? iha bhikṣavo		 Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan (dsp1-2_u.htm.txt) 25250900 (0.023):
dharmānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānam. etāny ucyante catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni. / [DsP_7] tatra katamāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni? iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9803864 (0.025):
catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni. / katamāni ca subhūte catvāri samyakprahāṇāni? anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15108719 (0.028):
punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ, yad uta / catvāri samyakprahāṇāni. katamāni catvāri? iha subhūte bodhisattvo		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 771318 (0.030):

(la) katamāni ca subhūte catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? yaduta (i) adhyātmakāye		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 759004 (0.046):

deśitā vo bhikṣavo mayā dharmāḥ skandhānāṃ pravicayāya / yad uta catvāri / smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakpradhānāni (DhskD 11v1) catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, IV (psp_4u.htm.txt) 1626731 (0.051):

20717 dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhate		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 772351 (0.004):

katamāṃścaturaḥ? saṃsārāvacarālaukikīṃ samyagdṛṣṭiṃ dadhāti | sa Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_au.htm.txt) 3782685 (0.010):

yathā śraddhāyāś caturo dharmān abhiśraddadhāti | / katamāṃś caturaḥ |
karmavipākapratiśaraṇo bhavati | yadyadeva karma kariṣyāmi kalyāṇaṃ vā Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanss18u.htm.txt) 11288405 (0.0):
