yat tena kṛtaṃ bhavati kalyāṇam atha pāpakam
pāpakaṃ vā, tasya karmaṇo vipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayāmi | sa jīvitahetorapi
pāpakaṃ karma nābhisaṃskaroti | idamucyate śraddhendriyam || tatra Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_au.htm.txt) 3782704 (0.039):
karmaṇaḥ phala vipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmi + iti | sa jīvita hetor api / pāpaṃ karma na karoti | bodhi satva cārikām abhiśraddadhāti |		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_pu.htm.txt) 26976785 (0.039):
karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti | sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ / karma na karoti | bodhisatvacārikām abhiśraddadhāti | taccaryāpratipannaś		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_au.htm.txt) 3782765 (0.058):
ca vigata kathaṃ kathas tān buddha dharmān samudānayati | idam ucyate / śraddhā indriyam || / tatra katamad vīrya indriyaṃ | yān dharmān śraddhā indriyeṇa śraddadhāti		 Santideva: Siksasamuccaya (sanssr_pu.htm.txt) 26976841 (0.058):
vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati | idam ucyate / śraddhendriyam || / tatra katamad vīryendriyaṃ | yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6950893 (0.059):
yad uta pañcendriyāṇi/ katamāni / 20804 pañca/ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ

pañcendriyāṇi || / [17] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katamāni pañca balāni? yaduta śraddhābalaṃ vīryabalaṃ Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15033057 (5.960):

bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ yāvad / upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957520 (0.025):
virāganiśrita nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam || samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ / bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957508 (0.025):
vyavasargapariṇatam | prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957484 (0.025):
nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam || vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati / vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam ||		 Mahaparinirvanasutra (mpsu_w_u.htm.txt) 24451668 (0.025):
2.27 (yāvac ca bhikṣavaḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayiṣyanti vivekaniśritaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957532 (0.025):
vyavasargapariṇatam || upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957496 (0.032):

20811 smṛti{saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ} yāvad upekṣā{saṃbodhyaṅgaṃ} bhāvayati / vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ		 Mahaparinirvanasutra (mpsu_w_u.htm.txt) 24451686 (0.045):
dharmavicayavīryaprītiprasrabdhisamādhyupekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayiṣyanti / vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ vṛddhir
vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam || evaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957231 (0.0):
chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati / vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇatam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957253 (0.0):
cittasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati vivekaniśritaṃ / virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me cittamatilīnaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957276 (0.0):
mīmāṃsāsamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati / vivekaniśritaṃ virāganiśritaṃ nirodhaniśritaṃ vyavasargapariṇataṃ mā me		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957490 (0.0):

yaiḥ(saṃ)kalpaiḥ śīlasamādhiprajñā vimuktidarśanaskandhāḥ samuttiṣṭhanti, Nagarjuna: Dharmasamgraha (Dharmasangraha) (bsa007_u.htm.txt) 11215688 (0.042):
23. lokottarapañcaskandhāḥ / / śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhā iti //		 Vasubandhu: Abhidharmakosa-bhasya (vakobhau.htm.txt) 23986692 (0.062):
tatra tāvat pañcānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhānāṃ / śīlaskandho rūpaskandhena saṃgṛhītaḥ /
tān saṃkalpān saṃkalpayati | ayamucyate samyaksaṃkalpaḥ || / tatra katamā samyagvāk? yayā rāge nātmānaṃ na parāṃśca tāpayati, nātmānaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2955021 (0.026):
cakravartyādipariṇāmitam | ayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ || samyagvāk / katamā? iha bhikṣavaḥ pāruṣyānṛtapaiśunyasaṃbhinnapralāpavarjitā
na parāṃśca kleśayati, nātmānaṃ parānnānupahanti, tayā samāhitayuktayā Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, V (psp_5u.htm.txt) 17242573 (0.062):
asaṃvidyamānaiḥ kleśam utpādayati, ātmānam utkarṣayati parān paṃśayati: na / tvam atra bodhisattvayāne saṃdṛśyase yathāham atra bodhisattvayāne		 Astasahasrika Prajnaparamita (bsu049_u.htm.txt) 4054249 (0.062):
ātmānamutkrośayati, parān paṃsayati na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu

[19] tatra bhikṣavaḥ katama āryāṣṭāṅga(mārgaḥ)? tadyathā - samyagdṛṣṭiḥ		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13647383 (0.037):
saṃvartate; madhyamā pratipat katamā? āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ; tasya		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 772601 (0.053):
bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ katama / āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ yad uta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyaksaṃkalpaḥ samyakkarmāntaḥ		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15108990 (0.054):
āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ. katama āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ? yad uta samyagdṛṣṭiḥ		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15033122 (0.054):
samyaksmṛtiḥ samyaksamādhiḥ, ayam ucyate āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ. / (A) tatra katame trayas samādhayaḥ? śūnyatāsamādhir ānimittasamādhir		 DASABALASUTRA 1-4 (dbsu1-4u.htm.txt) 24821981 (0.058):
paṃca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ / DbSū(3) 9 iti hi bhikṣavas tathāgato 'rhāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ anadhigatasya		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13648092 (0.060):
duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyaṃ katamat? āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ; / tadyathā, samyagdṛṣṭiḥ, samyaksaṅkalpaḥ; samyagvāk, samyakkarmāntaḥ;		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9804008 (0.060):
samyaksamādhiḥ, ayam ucyate āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ. / katamāni ca subhūte catvāry apramāṇāni? maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāḥ, imāny
dīrghaṃ vā, āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6949959 (0.0):

prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188257 (0.015):
āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / prasrabhya"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958020 (0.020):
| sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958001 (0.024):
prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī / praśvasan prītipratisaṃvedī (praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300375 (0.040):

prajānāti | hrasvaṃ praśvasan hrasvaṃ praśvasimīti (SSS_466) prajānāti || / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957922 (0.0):

yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī / (praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958055 (0.014):

sarvakāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāya(saṃskāra)pratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957954 (0.029):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | sarvakāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188245 (0.031):
praśvasan praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / dīrgham hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy / āśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958073 (0.040):
cittasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | abhimodati		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958085 (0.049):
me cittamāśvasan abhimodati me cittamāśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / abhimodati me cittaṃ praśvasan abhimodati me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2044194 (0.063):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2045110 (0.064):
dīrgha[māśvasan] vā [śikṣate] hrasvaṃ vā sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā / praśrambhayan kāyasaṃskāraṃ vā [śikṣate] | tasmin samaye
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957915 (0.0):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300384 (0.009):
śikṣate | sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan | sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188256 (0.009):
āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / prasrabhya"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957879 (0.010):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300375 (0.013):
hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisamvedī | āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī | āśvasimīti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957908 (0.014):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957896 (0.015):
praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957886 (0.016):
kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958028 (0.024):
| sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957961 (0.024):
yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | sarvakāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī āśvasan / sarvakāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāya(saṃskāra)pratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958042 (0.031):
(praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan / cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ (AvSū, Vaidya 324)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958008 (0.038):
praśvasan prītipratisaṃvedī (praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ jānāti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957993 (0.039):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan / prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188247 (0.044):
āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958053 (0.052):
prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957912 (0.0):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957919 (0.0):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300387 (0.0):
hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisamvedī | āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī | āśvasimīti / śikṣate | sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan | sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188257 (0.0):
āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / prasrabhya"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957889 (0.009):
kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957881 (0.011):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957896 (0.017):
praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300375 (0.022):
hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisamvedī | āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī | āśvasimīti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958033 (0.023):
prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957961 (0.024):
sarvakāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāya(saṃskāra)pratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958020 (0.025):
| sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958054 (0.030):
prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958001 (0.038):
prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī / praśvasan prītipratisaṃvedī (praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2044194 (0.042):
prajānāti | hrasvaṃ praśvasan hrasvaṃ praśvasimīti (SSS_466) prajānāti || / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188245 (0.051):
praśvasan praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / dīrgham hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy / āśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī"		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2045109 (0.062):
dīrgha[māśvasan] vā [śikṣate] hrasvaṃ vā sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā / praśrambhayan kāyasaṃskāraṃ vā [śikṣate] | tasmin samaye
yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | sarvakāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī āśvasan Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957926 (0.008):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī vā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957908 (0.010):
yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957888 (0.013):
praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957879 (0.015):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957897 (0.023):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958019 (0.025):
| sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188245 (0.029):
praśvasan praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / dīrgham hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy / āśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958036 (0.032):
yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī / (praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958055 (0.032):
prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957986 (0.033):
prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan
sarvakāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāya(saṃskāra)pratisaṃvedī Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957903 (0.011):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957923 (0.015):

hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisamvedī | āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī | āśvasimīti		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188257 (0.023):

kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958055 (0.025):
prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958041 (0.033):
yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī / (praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957932 (0.034):
praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188246 (0.037):
praśvasan praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / dīrgham hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy / āśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957874 (0.042):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan / kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2045110 (0.048):

sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasan Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958060 (0.0):
prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957888 (1.788):

prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957897 (0.045):

sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī vā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957947 (0.048):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | sarvakāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957937 (0.049):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957877 (0.059):

praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti
prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārāḥ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958070 (0.019):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ / (āśvasan) āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958059 (0.020):
prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957914 (0.045):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī vā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957937 (0.045):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957946 (0.056):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | sarvakāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957879 (0.058):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan / kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958019 (0.019):
sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ jānāti / | sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958036 (0.021):
prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958027 (0.022):
| sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188538 (0.023):
vā dhyānasya dvitīyasya vā tasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedy āśvasan, / prītipratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate /"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957887 (0.026):
kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957878 (0.026):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957947 (0.033):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | sarvakāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957964 (0.033):
sarvakāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāya(saṃskāra)pratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958056 (0.033):
prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300634 (0.034):
dhyānasya, dvitīyasya vā yasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan, / prītipratisaṃvedī (|) āśvasi mīti śikṣate | sa cetpunarlābhī bhavati |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958071 (0.036):
(āśvasan) āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me / cittasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | abhimodati		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957905 (0.037):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957897 (0.041):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957917 (0.041):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārāpratisaṃvedī vā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957937 (0.048):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2044217 (0.049):
prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate | prītipratisaṃvedī		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300407 (0.060):
kāyasaṃskārān praśvasan, praśrabhya kāyasaṃskārān praśvasimīti śikṣate | / prītipratisaṃvedī sukhapratisaṃvedī śikṣate | cittasaṃskārapratisamvedī
prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188538 (0.011):
vā dhyānasya dvitīyasya vā tasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedy āśvasan, / prītipratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate /"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958025 (0.019):
| sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958033 (0.021):
prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957884 (0.025):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300635 (0.033):

prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate | prītipratisaṃvedī
praśvasan prītipratisaṃvedī (praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958033 (0.020):

sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ jānāti Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958033 (0.017):

praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2044221 (0.054):

| sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957996 (0.019):

praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958055 (0.027):

sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957914 (0.034):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957935 (0.034):

kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188256 (0.049):
āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / prasrabhya"		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300384 (0.049):

yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī / (praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2044221 (0.055):

cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | pratisaṃvedayati | tenāha / cittapratisaṃvedī |		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188694 (0.027):
asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ vimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittam iti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti pratisaṃvedayati / tenāha cittapratisaṃvedī /		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958063 (0.029):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me cittasaṃskārāḥ / (āśvasan) āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958071 (0.031):
cittasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | abhimodati		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958042 (0.046):

cittasaṃskāraṃ praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti / śikṣate | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || abhipramodayan		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300375 (0.059):
hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisamvedī | āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī | āśvasimīti
yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957884 (0.012):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958004 (0.017):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan / prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958055 (0.018):
prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957988 (0.021):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prītipratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957946 (0.023):
sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasāmīti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957917 (0.025):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī vā praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957938 (0.025):
praśvasan yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300795 (0.028):
cittamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | pratisaṃvedayati | tenāha / cittapratisaṃvedī |		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188694 (0.028):
asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ vimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittam iti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti pratisaṃvedayati / tenāha cittapratisaṃvedī /		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957907 (0.040):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6300384 (0.041):
śikṣate | sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasan | sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasimīti śikṣate | praśrabhya		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15188256 (0.041):
āśvasan sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī"ti śikṣate / sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasan "sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasimī"ti śikṣate / prasrabhya"		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957896 (0.047):
kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957959 (0.053):
sarvakāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāya(saṃskāra)pratisaṃvedī		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2044249 (0.055):
cittasaṃskāraṃ praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasiṣyāmīti / śikṣate | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasiṣyāmīti śikṣate || abhipramodayan
(praśvasāmīti) yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957887 (0.012):
kāyapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyapratisaṃvedī / praśvasan kāyapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957962 (0.014):

kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | kāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957920 (0.015):

cittasaṃskārāḥ praśvasan praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | abhimodati Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957988 (0.019):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasan / prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957966 (0.028):
sarvakāyasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sarvakāya(saṃskāra)pratisaṃvedī / praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | prasrabhyanti me kāyasaṃskārā āśvasan		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958033 (0.028):
prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti / yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī praśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958025 (0.031):
| sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasan sukhapratisaṃvedī praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasan cittapratisaṃvedī āśvasāmīti		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 771558 (0.035):
praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti hrasvaṃ vā āśvasan hrasvaṃ vā (PSP1: / 205) āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti hrasvaṃ vā praśvasan hrasvaṃ vā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958042 (0.039):

samāhitaṃ me cittaṃ praśvasan samāhitaṃ me cittaṃ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ / prajānāti | evamanityānudarśī virāgānudarśī nirodhānudarśī
ṣoḍaśākārā ānāpānasmṛtiḥ || / [21] tatra katamāni catvāri srotaāpattyaṅgāni? iha bhikṣavaḥ śrāvako Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958356 (0.028):
jayasaṃpannāni agarhitāni vijñairiti | imāni catvāri srotaāpattyaṅgāni || / [22] katamāni bhikṣavo daśa tathāgatabalāni? tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2957845 (0.030):
[20] tatra katamā bhikṣavaḥ ṣoḍaśākārā ānāpānasmṛtiḥ? hrasvaṃ vā āśvasan		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 2043845 (0.045):
satpuruṣopāśrayaḥ ātmasamyakpraṇidhiḥ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā iti | [sa] / catvāri srotaāpattyaṅgāni ca sādhayati yaduta satpuruṣasaṃvāsaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2953763 (0.064):
ṣoḍaśākārā ānāpānānusmṛtiḥ | catvāri srotāpattyaṅgāni | daśa

'vetya prasādena samanvāgato bhavati - supratipanno bhagavataḥ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958174 (0.035):

chāriputro bhikṣūn āmaṃtrayate sma. ihāyuṣmaṃto bhikṣuḥ śīlasaṃpannaś ca / bhavati samādhisampannaś ca prajñāsaṃpannaś ca. so 'bhīkṣṇaṃ		 Harivarman: Satyasiddhisastra (hvsatssu.htm.txt) 1944524 (0.064):

abhinirnāmayesi / so nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmare / sayyathīdaṃ / ekāṃ vā jātiṃ dve vā jātīṃ trīṇi vā jātīṃ catvāri vā jātīṃ paṃca vā jātīṃ		 Lalitavistara (bsu022_u.htm.txt) 9887273 (0.060):

sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ / cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvā		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 17996410 (0.040):

DbSū(4) 5.10a punar aparaṃ tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ / cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 773181 (0.032):
sattvānāṃ cyutopapādaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti sa āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ / cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvā		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 17996410 (0.032):
śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ; so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ / cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtya		 DASABALASUTRA 1-4 (dbsu1-4u.htm.txt) 24821431 (0.034):
DbSū(1) 10. punar aparaṃ tathāgata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ / prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya		 DASABALASUTRA 1-4 (dbsu1-4u.htm.txt) 24821458 (0.034):
yat tathāgata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa		 DASABALASUTRA 1-4 (dbsu1-4u.htm.txt) 24822899 (0.034):
DbSū(4) 5.10b yat tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ / prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya		 Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan (dsp1-2_u.htm.txt) 25253058 (0.034):
sattvānāṃ cyutyupapattiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti; / āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15109583 (0.034):

śroṇa vihāreṇa viharan nacirād eva āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ / prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā, upasaṃpadya		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 17996494 (0.034):
'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ		 Yasomitra: Sphutartha Abhidharmakosavyakhya (yabhkvyu.htm.txt) 12024355 (0.034):
baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād / anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9804704 (0.034):
pūrvāntakoṭiśo yāvat sākāraṃ soddeśaṃ sanidānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, / āsravakṣayeṇānāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti, imāny ucyante		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15033443 (0.036):
paśyati. yāvat sugatau svargaloke deveṣu upapadyamānān. (x) āsravāṇāṃ / kṣayād anāsravaṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. imāni		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6951606 (0.047):
21019 vāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme
tathāgatabalāni || / [23] katamāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya catvāri vaiśāradyāni? iha bhagavān Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958359 (0.013):
jayasaṃpannāni agarhitāni vijñairiti | imāni catvāri srotaāpattyaṅgāni || / [22] katamāni bhikṣavo daśa tathāgatabalāni? tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15033450 (0.025):

mahāyānaṃ. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya mahāyānaṃ yad / idaṃ catvāri / 7 vaiśāradyāni katamāni catvāri samyaksaṃbuddhasya me pratijānataḥ |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958637 (0.044):
sahadharmeṇeti | imāni bhikṣavo bhagavatastathāgatasya catvāri / vaiśāradyāni ||		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 773223 (0.044):
bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāyānaṃ yad uta catvāri vaiśāradyāni / katamāni catvāri yad uta samyaksaṃbuddhasya vata me pratijānataḥ ime		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15109623 (0.044):

DbSū(3) 14 daśa tathāgatabalāni katamāni daśa
samyaksaṃbuddha ityātmānaṃ prajānīte | ime tvayā dharmā nābhisaṃbuddhā Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9804717 (0.057):
pratijānata ime dharmā nābhisaṃbuddhā ity atra me kaścit sadevake loke

nāhaṃ ānaṃda taṃ dharme samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake / saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāṃ ca imāṃ vasudhārā nāma		 Vasudharadharani (=Vasudharadharanisutra) (vadhdhdu.htm.txt) 21848964 (0.0):

51. catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ / tadyathā dharmapratisaṃvit, / arthapratisaṃvit, niruktipratisaṃvit, pratibhānapratisaṃvicceti //		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6323838 (0.012):
| catasraḥ pratisamvidaḥ tadyathā dharmapratisaṃvidartha / pratisaṃvinniruktipratisamvitpratibhānapratisamvit [|]		 Samadhirajasutra (bsu034_u.htm.txt) 28033017 (0.022):
pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti | katamāścatasraḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvidaṃ / dharmapratisaṃvidaṃ niruktipratisaṃvidaṃ pratibhānapratisaṃvidam |		 Suvikrantavikramipariprccha (bsu030_u.htm.txt) 12564573 (0.022):

(SSS_518) yā pratisaṃvit | iyaṃ dharmapratisaṃvit | ruteṣu pratisaṃvit / niruktipratisaṃvit | yaduta [nānā]digantaravyavahṛtarutaviśeṣa[jñāna]m |		 Samadhirajasutra (bsu034_u.htm.txt) 28033024 (0.058):

dharmapratisaṃvin, niruktipratisaṃvit, pratibhānapratisaṃvit. etā ucyante / catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ.
bhikṣavaścatasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ || / [25] katame bhikṣavo 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ? nāsti tathāgatasya Abhidharmasamuccayabhasya (= Abhidh-s-bh) (abhsubhu.htm.txt) 4548873 (0.0):
nirantarasarvaprakāraduḥkhālaṃbana karuṇāvihārasamṛddhau samādhyādayaḥ // / aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāstadyathā nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitam, nāsti		 Nagarjuna: Dharmasamgraha (Dharmasangraha) (bsa007_u.htm.txt) 11216639 (0.0):
79. aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ / tadyathā nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitam		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15033579 (0.007):
(20) katame ca subhūte [f. 280b] tathāgatasya aṣṭādaśāveṇikā / buddhadharmāḥ? (i) nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitaṃ, (ii) nāsti ravitaṃ, (iii)		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15124952 (0.020):
nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad utāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti na ca / buddhadharmeṣu nāma nāmni buddhadharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yac ca		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15126715 (0.020):
yo bhagavann aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇām anutpādo na te / 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti hi buddhadharmāś cānutpādaś cādvayam etad		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6966663 (0.021):
aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ tatha hi yac ca nāma ye ca / aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate}}/		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 788122 (0.021):
aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tatha hi yac ca nāma ye ca / aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā ubhayaṃ etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 752767 (0.021):
bodhipakṣā dharmāḥ na bhagavan (PSP1: 153) anyā māyā anye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā / buddhadharmāḥ aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15040318 (0.021):
pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṃgāny āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga triṇi vimokṣamukhāni yāvad / aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, tad api na tathā paramārthaḥ, yaduta		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15092408 (0.022):
na bhagavann anyā māyā anye 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā / buddhadharmā eva bhagavan māyā māyaiva bhagavann aṣṭādaśāveṇikā		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6959461 (0.023):
tarhi subhūte aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā 'bhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 780989 (0.023):

vimukterhāniḥ, trivimuktijñānadarśanāni, atīte 'dhvanyasaṅgamapratihataṃ Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15033635 (0.023):

tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam | suvarṇavarṇacchavitā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958961 (0.018):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958999 (0.018):
|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959013 (0.018):
kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959028 (0.018):
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959052 (0.018):
nirvṛttam | aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959061 (0.018):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959133 (0.018):
ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam | abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959146 (0.018):
nirvṛttam | gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959186 (0.018):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959234 (0.018):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959261 (0.018):
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959274 (0.018):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958988 (0.023):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959040 (0.024):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959087 (0.026):
nirvṛttam | prabhūta(tanu)jihvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ satyabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam | rasarasāgratā -		 Mahavadanasutra (mavadsuu.htm.txt) 19108823 (0.034):
samadanto deva kumāra idaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam 22 / aviraḍadaṃto deva kumāra idaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam 23
parasattvājihmakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam | āyatapādapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā - Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958779 (0.026):
pādatalayoścakrāṅkitapādatalatā | āyatapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā | dīrghāṅgulitā
tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve mātāpitarau satkṛtya caraṇe Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958960 (0.048):

pūrvaṃ dṛḍhasamādānatayā nirvṛttam | adhastātpādatalayoścakrāṅkitapā / datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958902 (0.045):

mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ satyabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam | rasarasāgratā - / tathāgatasya (mahā)puruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ (AvSū, Vaidya 327)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959075 (0.047):

|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959013 (1.192):
kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959028 (1.192):
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959050 (1.192):
nirvṛttam | aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959061 (1.192):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959076 (1.192):
manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam | suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959132 (1.192):
ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam | abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959148 (1.192):
nirvṛttam | gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959186 (1.192):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959213 (1.192):
indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959234 (1.192):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959260 (1.192):
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959275 (1.192):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959157 (0.010):
tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam | suvarṇavarṇacchavitā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958917 (0.018):
datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959246 (0.020):
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959039 (0.023):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959117 (0.027):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.036):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958893 (0.041):
mahānārāyaṇabalasamantaprāsādikatā | tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam | imāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ||
parivārābhedanatayā nirvṛttam | mṛdutaruṇahastapādatātathāgatasyedaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958789 (0.035):
| jālahastapādatā | mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā | saptotsadaśarīratā |		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9805028 (0.035):
cakrāṅkitahastapādatā, supratiṣṭhitapādatā, jālahastapādatā, / mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā, saptocchrayatā, dīrghāṅgulitā, āyatapārṣṇitā,		 Ratnakarasanti: Saratama (bsa051_u.htm.txt) 7898029 (0.035):
jālapāṇipādatā mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā saptocchrayatā ceti /		 Abhisamayalankaravrttih sphutartha (bsa031_u.htm.txt) 6438794 (0.037):
(4) praṇītakhādyabhojyādidānād mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā / / (5) praṇītataralehyādidānena samucchritahastapādaskandhagrīvāpradeśatvāt		 Lalitavistara (bsu022_u.htm.txt) 9901241 (0.045):

cakrāṅkitahastapādaṃ mṛdutaruṇopacitapāṇiīpādaṃ saptotsadaṃ		 Nagarjuna: Dharmasamgraha (Dharmasangraha) (bsa007_u.htm.txt) 11216778 (0.055):
supratiṣṭhitapāṇipādatalatā / jālābalabaddhā(vanaddhā?)ṅgulipāṇipādatalatā / / mṛdutaruṇahastapādatalatā / saptotsadatā / dīrghāṅgulitā / āyatapārṣṇitā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959149 (0.062):

śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959061 (0.049):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959211 (0.049):
indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959026 (0.050):
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958902 (0.051):
supratiṣṭhitau pādautathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959232 (0.053):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |
|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam | Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959132 (5.960):
ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam | abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959146 (5.960):
nirvṛttam | gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (1.192):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958960 (1.192):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959029 (1.192):
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959051 (1.192):
nirvṛttam | aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959061 (1.192):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959075 (1.192):
manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam | suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959186 (1.192):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959213 (1.192):
indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959234 (1.192):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959260 (1.192):
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959275 (1.192):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959157 (0.010):
tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam | suvarṇavarṇacchavitā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958917 (0.018):
datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959246 (0.020):
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959039 (0.023):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959117 (0.027):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958890 (0.047):
mahānārāyaṇabalasamantaprāsādikatā | tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam | imāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ||
kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (1.192):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958961 (1.192):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959050 (1.192):

gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959275 (1.192):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959157 (0.010):

datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / parasattvājihmakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam | āyatapādapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959246 (0.020):
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959039 (0.023):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959117 (0.027):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.047):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958890 (0.053):
mahānārāyaṇabalasamantaprāsādikatā | tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam | imāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ||		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958975 (0.056):
parivārābhedanatayā nirvṛttam | mṛdutaruṇahastapādatātathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve vividhaprāvaraṇānnapradānatayā
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā -
tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (1.192):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958961 (1.192):

|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959051 (1.192):

uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959118 (0.027):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.050):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958891 (0.059):

indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (0.019):

mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958961 (0.023):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958999 (0.023):
|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959013 (0.023):
kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959061 (0.023):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959075 (0.023):
manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam | suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959133 (0.023):
ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam | abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959146 (0.023):
nirvṛttam | gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959186 (0.023):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959234 (0.023):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959260 (0.023):
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959275 (0.023):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958918 (0.024):
datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959245 (0.036):
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959171 (0.042):
dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam | suvarṇavarṇacchavitā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959118 (0.043):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)
nirvṛttam | aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959073 (0.0):
manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam | suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959211 (0.035):
indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959026 (0.038):
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958959 (0.041):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958997 (0.045):
|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959131 (0.045):
ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam | abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959145 (0.045):
nirvṛttam | gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959012 (0.046):
kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.047):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958891 (0.049):
mahānārāyaṇabalasamantaprāsādikatā | tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam | imāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ||		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959273 (0.049):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959232 (0.050):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959184 (0.051):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958944 (0.052):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959258 (0.059):
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (1.192):

uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959039 (0.023):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959117 (0.027):

gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959275 (1.192):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959157 (0.010):
tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam | suvarṇavarṇacchavitā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959246 (0.020):
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959039 (0.023):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959117 (0.027):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959196 (0.046):
saṃgaṇikāparivarjanatayā nirvṛttam | pradakṣiṇāvartaromatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣaṣya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.047):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam
nirvṛttam | prabhūta(tanu)jihvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya Mahavadanasutra (mavadsuu.htm.txt) 19108853 (0.052):
rasarasāgraprāpto deva kumāra idaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam 26 / prabhūtatanujihvo deva kumāra prabhūtatvāj jihvayā mukhāj jihvāṃ		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13631930 (0.052):
(25) simhahanū (26) rasarasāgraprāptaḥ; idaṃ deva kumārasya mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam; (27) prabhūtatanujihvo deva kumāraḥ; apīdānīṃ
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ satyabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam | rasarasāgratā - Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958945 (0.022):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958902 (0.024):
supratiṣṭhitau pādautathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958988 (0.026):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958916 (0.026):
pūrvaṃ dṛḍhasamādānatayā nirvṛttam | adhastātpādatalayoścakrāṅkitapā / datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959038 (0.057):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959196 (0.060):
saṃgaṇikāparivarjanatayā nirvṛttam | pradakṣiṇāvartaromatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣaṣya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958960 (0.064):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958998 (0.064):
|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959013 (0.064):
kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959027 (0.064):
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959050 (0.064):
nirvṛttam | aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959061 (0.064):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959132 (0.064):
ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam | abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959146 (0.064):
nirvṛttam | gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959185 (0.064):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959213 (0.064):
indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959233 (0.064):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959259 (0.064):
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959274 (0.064):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā
tathāgatasya (mahā)puruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ (AvSū, Vaidya 327) Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.041):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958944 (0.046):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958891 (0.053):
mahānārāyaṇabalasamantaprāsādikatā | tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam | imāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ||		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959184 (0.059):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959258 (0.061):

jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve
pūrveṣvapramāṇapuṇyaskandha.....tvātmanatāparamābhiprapacchannatayā
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya

nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958890 (0.047):
mahānārāyaṇabalasamantaprāsādikatā | tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam | imāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ||
nirvṛttam | gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958997 (5.960):
|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959232 (0.036):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958959 (0.038):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959049 (0.045):
nirvṛttam | aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959073 (0.045):
manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam | suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959012 (0.046):
kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.047):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958890 (0.047):
mahānārāyaṇabalasamantaprāsādikatā | tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam | imāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ||		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959273 (0.047):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959184 (0.048):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959026 (0.050):
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959211 (0.051):
indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958944 (0.055):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959258 (0.058):
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959060 (0.058):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā - Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (1.192):

suvarṇavarṇo deva kumāraḥ kāñcanasaṃnibhatvacaḥ idaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam 14 / sūkṣmacchavir deva kumāraḥ (MAV 82) sūkṣmatvāt tvaco rajojalaṃ kāye na
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā -
tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / saṃgaṇikāparivarjanatayā nirvṛttam | pradakṣiṇāvartaromatā - Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (1.192):

datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / parasattvājihmakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam | āyatapādapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959246 (0.020):
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959039 (0.023):

nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.045):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam
tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣaṣya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / ācāryopādhyāyakalyāṇamitrānuśāsanipradakṣiṇagrāhitayā nirvṛttam | Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958916 (0.046):
datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959075 (0.046):
manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam | suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā		 SUKHAVATIVYUHA (sukhvylu.htm.txt) 16527585 (0.054):
arthāya mahāpraṇidhānaṃ samudānītavān ; buddhadharma- / saṃghācāryopādhyāyakalyāṇamitrasagauravo ; nityasaṃnaddho		 Sukhavativyuha, Vistaramatrika (bsu033_u.htm.txt) 21408861 (0.054):
buddhadharmasaṃghācāryopādhyāyakalyāṇamitrasagauravo nityasaṃnaddho		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959087 (0.060):
nirvṛttam | prabhūta(tanu)jihvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ satyabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam | rasarasāgratā -
indranīlakeśatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (1.192):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958961 (1.192):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958999 (1.192):
|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959013 (1.192):
kambugrīvatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959028 (1.192):
glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959050 (1.192):
nirvṛttam | aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959061 (1.192):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959076 (1.192):
manāpamaṇipradānatayā nirvṛttam | suśukladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve svārakṣitakāyavāṅmanaskarmatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959132 (1.192):
ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam | abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959146 (1.192):
nirvṛttam | gopakṣmanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve a(pra?)kṛtimātayā nirvṛttam | sūkṣmacchavitā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959186 (1.192):
śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959234 (1.192):
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959261 (1.192):
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959275 (1.192):
śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve tathāgatabimbakaraṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959157 (0.005):
tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam | suvarṇavarṇacchavitā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958918 (0.013):
datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959039 (0.017):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959246 (0.020):
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959117 (0.027):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958987 (0.046):
nirvṛttam | saptotsadaśarīratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ parakiṃkaraṇīyasaumukhyakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam
sarvaprāṇānukampanatayā nihataloṣṭadaṇḍaśastratayā nirvṛttam |
suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958873 (0.0):
uttuṅgapradakṣiṇāvartaromatā | indranīlakeśatā | / suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā | uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958997 (0.036):

dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam | suvarṇavarṇacchavitā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959118 (0.044):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)
gurugauravapraṇāmatayā nirvṛttam | nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalasamantaprāsādikatā
- tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve ātmanaḥ Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958946 (1.192):
śuśrūṣatayābhinirvṛttam | dīrghāṅgulikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve dharmārakṣāvaraṇaguptikaraṇayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958960 (1.192):
jālahastapādatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958999 (1.192):
|........viśuddhanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve daśakuśalakarmapathātaptasamādānatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959013 (1.192):

glāneṣu vividhabhaiṣajyānnapradānatayā nirvṛttam | siṃhahanutā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959051 (1.192):
nirvṛttam | aviraladantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959061 (1.192):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve bhinnasattvasaṃghānatayā nirvṛttam | samadantatā / - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959075 (1.192):

ānandavacanaśravaṇatayā nirvṛttam | abhinīlanetratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve maitravatsattvasaṃrakṣaṇatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959146 (1.192):

śayyāsanāstaraṇamanāpavacanapradānatayā nirvṛttam | ekaikaromakūpatā - / tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959214 (1.192):

suśuklabhramukhāntarorṇalalāṭatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve varṇārhānāṃ varṇabhāṣaṇatayā nirvṛttam |		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959157 (0.010):

parasattvānāṃ ca samādhau niyojanatayā nirvṛttam | / śarīrasamantaprāsādikatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958891 (0.0):
