tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / dharmasaṃgīticittasaṃrakṣaṇakarmaṇyatayā nirvṛttam | suvarṇavarṇacchavitā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958917 (0.018):
datalatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve / parasattvājihmakaraṇatayā nirvṛttam | āyatapādapārṣṇisaṃgatapādatā -		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959246 (0.020):
uṣṇīṣaśiraskatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959039 (0.023):
kuśalamūlaprayogatayā nirvṛttam | samacatvāriṃśaddantatā - tathāgatasyedaṃ / mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve sattvasamāśvāsanaprayogatayā		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2959117 (0.027):
nirvṛttam | brahmakalaviṅkarutasvaratā - tathāgatasyedaṃ mahāpuruṣasya / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pūrve snigdhavacanasattvānāṃvanatā(?)
bhinnastūpapratisaṃskāratayā pareṣāṃ ca bhītānāmāśvāsanasaṃghānatayā ca
nirvṛttam | apramāṇaiḥ kuśalamūlaiśca teṣu dharmeṣu vaśavartitvāt
tathāgatasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye nirvṛttāni || Satasahasrika Prajnaparamita, II-2 (sspp2_2u.htm.txt) 23001809 (0.051):
mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, dvātriṃśatāni / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam (ŚsP II 2 180)		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, II-III (psp_2-3u.htm.txt) 15234525 (0.052):
upalambhayogena. mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam. / dvātriṃśac ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye niṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam.		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958759 (0.055):
bhikṣavastathāgatasya aṣṭādaśāveṇikā dharmāḥ || / [26] tatra katamāni tathāgatasya dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni?		 Ratnakarasanti: Saratama (bsa051_u.htm.txt) 7898435 (0.056):
mahāpuruṣakāratvāt mahāpuruṣāstathāgatā mahābodhisattvāśca / teṣāṃ / dyotakāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni dvātriṃśat / teṣāmeva		 Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan (dsp1-2_u.htm.txt) 25253648 (0.056):
[DsP_56] tatra katamāni tathāgatasya dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni? / yaduta		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15118279 (0.057):
yasmāt subhūte dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny abhāvo nabhāvas tasmāt / tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ tejasā ca		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9805835 (0.057):
imāny ucyante dvātriṃśad mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny ebhiḥ subhūte dvātriṃśad / mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇais tathāgatasya kāyaḥ samanvāgato bhavati.		 Bodhisattvabhumi (bsa034_u.htm.txt) 24877824 (0.062):
dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni katamāni / supratiṣṭhitapādo mahāpuruṣaḥ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9814482 (0.063):
dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītyanuvyañjanāny aparipūrayitvānuttarā		 Pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā I (psp_1u.htm.txt) 15058082 (0.063):
tyaktukāmena buddhakule upapattukāmena, aśītyanuvyañjanāni / dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ca niṣpādayitukāmena bodhisattvena		 Arthaviniscayasutra (bsu005_u.htm.txt) 2958894 (0.064):
mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam | imāni bhikṣavastathāgatasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni ||		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspdut2u.htm.txt) 6959832 (0.064):
tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny / abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita (pspduttu.htm.txt) 781359 (0.064):
cābhyabhaviṣyat yasmāt subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya / dvātriṃśat mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny abhāvo na bhāvas tasmāt tathāgatā arhantaḥ
[27] katamāni aśītyanuvyañjanāni? tāmranakhāśca buddhā bhagavantaḥ, Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, VI-VIII (psp_6-8u.htm.txt) 9805848 (0.027):
katamāni ca subhūte tathāgatasyāśīty anuvyañjanāni? tāmranakhāś ca buddhā		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15034381 (0.036):
aśītir anuvyañjanāni tathāgatasya? tadyathā 1. tāmranakhāś ca buddhā		 Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15025905 (0.063):
bhāvayati. tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ. yal lakṣaṇāni yad / aśītim anuvyañjanāni abhinirhārati tan nānyatra prajñāpāramitayā
snigdhanakhāśca uttuṅganakhāśca vṛttāṅgulinakhāśca cittāṅgulayaśca
anupūrvāṅgulayaśca gūḍhaśirāśca nirgranthiśirāśca gūḍhagulphāśca Astadasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, Parivartas 70 (contd.) - 82 (adsp70-u.htm.txt) 15034410 (0.036):
citāṅgulayaś ca bhavanti, 7. anupūrvāṅgulaś ca, 8. gūḍhaśirāś ca bhavanti,
siṃhavikrāntagāminaśca nāgavikrāntagāminaśca haṃsavikrāntagāminaśca Dasasahasrika Prajnaparamita, chapter 1 and 2 translated from the Tibetan (dsp1-2_u.htm.txt) 25254192 (0.011):

kalyā)ṇ(aṃ) ma(dh)ye kalyāṇ(aṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ / kevalaṃ) paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati ||		 Samadhirajasutra (transliteration of Gilgit ms.) (srajsgiu.htm.txt) 18525082 (0.017):
2461-4 /// svārthaṃ suvyaṃjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ / paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakā		 Mahavastu-Avadana (mhvastuu.htm.txt) 18640782 (0.018):
ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ / kevalaparipūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ prakāśayati // atha
nāma dharmaparyāyamiti yato yaduktamidaṃ tat pratyuktam | bhikṣavo
'raṇyāyatanāni śūnyāgārāṇi parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālavrajāni Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6278812 (0.0):
viviktāni śayanāsanānyadhyāvasatyaraṇyāni, vṛkṣamūlāni, śūnyāgārāṇi, / parvatakandaragiriguhāpalāla[puṃjā]bhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21589240 (0.0):
213.005. sa evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati etāni bhikṣavo 'raṇyāni / śūnyāgārāṇi / parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni		 Pravrajyavastu of the Vinayavstvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (Vastu 1 im (vinv01_u.htm.txt) 9437205 (0.0):
sa evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati etāni bhikṣavo 'raṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni / śūnyāgārāṇi / parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālapuṃjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni		 Sravakabhumi (srabhu_u.htm.txt) 15161525 (0.0):
viviktāni śayanāsanāny adhyāvasaty araṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni śūnyāgārāṇi / parvatakandaragiriguhāpalālapuṃjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni prāntāni		 Vinayavastu, 15: Sayanasanavastu. (vinv15_u.htm.txt) 14806874 (0.029):
uktaṃ bhagavatā; ekāny araṇyāni vṛkṣamūlāni śūnyāgārāṇi / parvatakandaragiriguhapalālapuñjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni (Śay-v 36)		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6311734 (0.047):
sthānasampattadyathā | araṇyamvā, vṛkṣamūlamvā, śūnyāgāramvā tatra / parvatakandaraṃ vā, giriguhā vā, palālapuṃjāni vā śūnyāgāramityucyate |		 Asanga: Sravakabhumi (srabhusu.htm.txt) 6311763 (0.062):
yadutāraṇyavṛkṣamūlaśūnyāgāraparvatagiriguhāpalālapuṃjābhyavakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni
abhrāvakāśaśmaśānavanaprasthāni.........bhikṣavo mā pramādyadhvam | mā Pravrajyavastu of the Vinayavstvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (Vastu 1 im (vinv01_u.htm.txt) 9437220 (0.0):
śayanāsanāni dhyāyata bhikṣavo mā pramādyata mā paścād vipratisāriṇo		 Vinayavastu, 15: Sayanasanavastu. (vinv15_u.htm.txt) 14806891 (0.0):
prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata, bhikṣavaḥ, mā pramādyata, mā paścād / vipratisāriṇo (A 326b) bhūta iti; āraṇyakatvasya ca bahudhā varṇo bhāṣitaḥ		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21589255 (1.192):
śayanāsanāni dhyāyata/ / 213.006. bhikṣavo mā pramādata/ / 213.007. mā paścādvipratisāriṇo bhūta/
paścādvipratisāriṇo bhaviṣyatha | idamasmākamanuśāsanam || / asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe pañcānāṃ Pravrajyavastu of the Vinayavstvagama of the Mulasarvastivadin (Vastu 1 im (vinv01_u.htm.txt) 9437223 (0.0):
śayanāsanāni dhyāyata bhikṣavo mā pramādyata mā paścād vipratisāriṇo		 Kasyapaparivartasutra (kasyparu.htm.txt) 9790541 (0.021):
. 145 asmiṃ khalu punar dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe teṣāṃ / 2 paṃcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaḥ cittāni vimuktāni / te		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, IV (psp_4u.htm.txt) 1630944 (0.021):
acintyātulyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsamasamaparivartadharmaparyāye bhagavatā / bhāṣyamāṇe pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,		 Kasyapaparivartasutra (bsu020_u.htm.txt) 23695432 (0.029):
KP.145 asmiṃ khalu punardharmaparyāye / bhāṣyamāṇe........................... ṣāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānām		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21589257 (0.050):
213.006. bhikṣavo mā pramādata/ / 213.007. mā paścādvipratisāriṇo bhūta/		 Vinayavastu, 15: Sayanasanavastu. (vinv15_u.htm.txt) 14806891 (0.050):
prāntāni śayanāsanāni dhyāyata, bhikṣavaḥ, mā pramādyata, mā paścād / vipratisāriṇo (A 326b) bhūta iti; āraṇyakatvasya ca bahudhā varṇo bhāṣitaḥ		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21639829 (0.060):
425.007. asmiṃśca khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ		 Sardulakarnavadana (divav33u.htm.txt) 6650424 (0.060):
u17.45/.(p.210) asmiṃś ca khalu punar dharma^paryāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ		 Sukhavativyuha, Vistaramatrika (bsu033_u.htm.txt) 21415466 (0.062):
asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe dvādaśānāṃ sattvaniyutakoṭīnāṃ		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv171u.htm.txt) 13667498 (0.062):
idaṃ tatra bhagavato 'nuśasanīprātihāryam; asmin khalu dharmaparyāye / bhāṣyamāṇe tasya bhikṣusahasrasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ
bhikṣuśatānāmāsravebhyaścitāni vimuktāni || / idamavocadbhagavān | āttamanasaste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat Avadanasataka (avsata_u.htm.txt) 5623249 (0.029):
idam avocad bhagavān | āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam		 Avadanasataka (avsata_u.htm.txt) 5624031 (0.029):
idam avocad bhagavān | āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam		 Avadanasataka (avsata_u.htm.txt) 5661336 (0.029):
idam avocad bhagavān* | āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21531593 (0.029):
033.029. idamavocadbhagavān/ / 033.029. āttamanasaste bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti//		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21535235 (0.029):
046.027. idamavocadbhagavān/ / 046.027. āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21538387 (0.029):
057.012. idamavocadbhagavān/ / 057.012. āttamanasaste ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//		 Divyavadana (divyav_u.htm.txt) 21640234 (0.029):
426.031. idamavocadbhagavān/ / 426.031. āttamanasaste bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan//		 Dvavimsatyavadanakatha (dvavims_pu.htm.txt) 14307846 (0.029):
idam avocad bhagavān āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam		 Pratityasamutpadadivibhanganirdesasutra (bsu027_u.htm.txt) 8962295 (0.029):
idamavocadbhagavān | āttamanasaste bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandan		 Sanghabhedavastu (vinv172u.htm.txt) 18021332 (0.029):
idam avocad bhagavān: āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam		 Pancavimsatisahasrika Prajnaparamita, IV (psp_4u.htm.txt) 1630951 (0.036):
acintyātulyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsamasamaparivartadharmaparyāye bhagavatā / bhāṣyamāṇe pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,		 Astasahasrika Prajnaparamita (bsu049_u.htm.txt) 4039540 (0.037):
bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni, pañcānāṃ ca		 bauddha_aai_xvi.r.o.combined 14531034 (0.037):
māne trayāṇāṃ bhikṣu śatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni / vimuktāni pañcānāṃ ca bhikṣuṇī śatānāṃ virajo (310) vigata		 Kasyapaparivartasutra (kasyparu.htm.txt) 9790544 (0.039):
. 145 asmiṃ khalu punar dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe teṣāṃ / 2 paṃcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaḥ cittāni vimuktāni / te		 Vajravidarana-Dharani (vjviddhu.htm.txt) 17286619 (0.043):
idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāste ca bhikṣavaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat / sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti		 Kasyapaparivartasutra (bsu020_u.htm.txt) 23695436 (0.043):
KP.145 asmiṃ khalu punardharmaparyāye / bhāṣyamāṇe........................... ṣāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānām		 Mahapratisaramahavidyarajni (mahpratu.htm.txt) 28311409 (0.043):
[52] idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvāḥ sā / ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam		 Ajitasenavyakarana (ajitsvyu.htm.txt) 1374127 (0.047):
imavocad bhagavān āttamanā // / sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandat* /		 Ajitasenavyakarana (bsu006_u.htm.txt) 15279750 (0.047):
rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmyaha sūtraratnaṃ imavocadbhagavānāttamanā // / sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadbhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandat /		 Mahamantranusarini (mahama_u.htm.txt) 12790355 (0.047):
C.7.2. idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisatvā sā / ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam

Auteur: Vimala

Prepared for SuttaCentral by Ayya Vimala.
